original: svayaṁprabhā antarīkṣecarā sukhasthāyino yenakāmaṁgamā prabhūtabhakṣā pracurānnapānāḥ divyeṣu ratanāmayeṣu vimāneṣu aṣṭasu ca mahā-udyāneṣu  #
analyzed: svayam prabhāḥ sukha sthāyinaḥ yena kāma gamāḥ prabhūta bhakṣā pracura anna pānāḥ divyeṣu rata nāmayeṣu vimāneṣu aṣṭasu ca mahā udyāneṣu

original: vaijayante nandāpuṣkariṇīpāripātre kovidāre mahāvane pāru- ṣyake citrarathe nandane miśrakāvane apareṣu ca ratanāmayeṣu ca vimāneṣu divyehi  #
analyzed: vaijayante nandā puṣkariṇī pāripātre kovidāre mahā vane pāru ṣyake citrarathe nandane miśrakā vane apareṣu ca rata nāmayeṣu ca vimāneṣu

original: paṁcahi kāmaguṇehi samarpitā samaṅgībhūtā krīḍantā ramantā paricārayantā |
analyzed: pacahi kāmaguṇehi samarpitā samaṅgībhūtā krīḍantā ramantā paricārayantā

original: śakro pi devānāmindro vaijayante prāsāde aśītihi apsarasahasrehi parivṛtaḥ divyehi paṁcakāmaguṇehi samarpito samaṁgībhūto krīḍanto ramanto
analyzed: śakraḥ pi devānām indraḥ vaijayante prāsāde aśītihi apsara sahasrehi parivṛtaḥ divyehi paca kāmaguṇehi samarpitaḥ samagībhūtaḥ krīḍantaḥ ramantaḥ

original: sthaviro tāṁ devānāṁ trāyastriṁśānāṁ tādṛśīṁ samṛddhiṁ dṛṣṭvā divyāṁ saṁpattiṁ dṛṣṭvā sudarśanaṁ ca devanagaraṁ dṛṣṭvā saptaratanāmayaṁ sudarśanasya  #
analyzed: sthaviraḥ tām devānām trāyastriśānām tādṛśīm samṛddhim dṛṣṭvā divyām sapattim dṛṣṭvā sudarśanam ca deva nagaram dṛṣṭvā sapta rata nāmayam sudarśanasya

original: devanagarasya taṁ vidhānaṁ dṛṣṭvā sudharmāṁ ca devasabhāṁ sarvavaiḍūryamayīṁ yojanasāhasrikāṁ dṛṣṭvā yatra devā trāyastriṁśāḥ śakro ca devānāmindro  #
analyzed: deva nagarasya tam vidhānam dṛṣṭvā sudharmām ca deva sabhām sarva vaiḍūrya mayīm yojana sāhasrikām dṛṣṭvā yatra devā trāyastriśāḥ ca devānām indraḥ

original: sanniṣaṇā sannipatitā devakaraṇīyeṣu vāhyato devasabhāyāṁ dṛśyanti devā pi trāyastriṁśā sudharmāye devasabhāye niṣaṇāḥ sarvaṁ sudarśanaṁ devanagaraṁ  #
analyzed: sanniṣaṇā sannipatitā deva karaṇīyeṣu vāhyataḥ deva sabhāyām dṛśyanti devā trāyastriśā sudharmāye deva sabhāye niṣaṇāḥ sarvam sudarśanam deva nagaram

original: paśyanti ||
analyzed: paśyanti

original: evaṁ sthaviro sarvāṁ trāyastriṁśānāṁ devānāṁ samṛddhiṁ dṛṣṭvā jetavanamāgatvā caturṇāṁ parṣāṇāṁ vistareṇāroceti ||
analyzed: evam sthaviraḥ sarvām trāyastriśānām devānām samṛddhim dṛṣṭvā jetavanam āgatvā caturṇām parṣāṇām vistareṇa āroca iti

original: evaṁ satvā kuśalasya karmasya vipākena deveṣu trāyastriṁ- śeṣūpapannā divyāyo saṁpattīyo anubhavanti ||
analyzed: evam satvā kuśalasya karmasya vipākena deveṣu trāyastri śeṣu upapannāḥ anubhavanti

original: taṁ pi anityamadhruvaṁ vipariṇāma- dharmi ||
analyzed: tam anityam adhruvam vipariṇāma

original: tato cyavamānā narakatiricchapreteṣu upapadyanti ||
analyzed: cyavamānāḥ naraka tiriccha preteṣu upapadyanti

original: tasmājjñātavyaṁ prāptavyaṁ (32)
analyzed: tasmāt jñātavyam prāptavyam

original: boddhavyaṁ abhisaṁboddhavyaṁ kartavyaṁ kuśalaṁ kartavyaṁ brahmacaryaṁ na ca vā loke kiṁcitpāpaṁ karma karaṇīyanti vademi ||
analyzed: boddhavyam abhisaboddhavyam kartavyam kuśalam kartavyam brahmacaryam na ca vā loke kicid pāpam karma karaṇīyanti vademi

original: āyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyano bhīkṣṇaṁ yāmatuṣitanirmāṇaratiparanirmitavaśavartibra- hmakāyikā yāva śuddhāvāsāṁ devāṁ cārikāṁ gacchati ||
analyzed: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ bhīkṣṇam yāma tuṣita nirmāṇarati para nirmita vaśavarti brahmakāyikāḥ yāva śuddhāvāsām devām cārikām gacchati

original: so paśyati śuddhāvāsakā- yikāṁ devā kṛtapuṇyā maheśākhyāṁ dīrghāyuṣkāṁ varṇavantāṁ sukhabahulāṁ svayaṁprabhā anta- rīkṣāvacarā prītibhakṣā  #
analyzed: sā paśyati śuddhāvāsa kā yikām devā kṛta puṇyā maheśākhyām dīrgha āyuṣkām varṇavantām sukha bahulām svayaprabhā anta rīkṣā avacarā prīti bhakṣā

original: sukhasthāyino yenakāmaṁgamā vigatarāgā devārhanto anta- rāparinirvāyī anāvartikadharmā asmiṁ loke avyavakīrṇā sarvabālapṛthagjaneṣu ||
analyzed: sukha sthāyinaḥ yena kāma gamāḥ vigata rāgāḥ deva arhantaḥ antarā aparinirvāyī anāvartika dharmāḥ asmin loke a vyavakīrṇā sarva bāla pṛthagjaneṣu

original: sthaviro tāntādṛśīṁ samṛddhiṁ devānāṁ dṛṣṭvā jetavanamāgatvā caturṇāṁ parṣāṇāṁ vista- reṇārocayati ||
analyzed: sthaviraḥ tān tādṛśīm samṛddhim devānām dṛṣṭvā jetavanam āgatvā caturṇām parṣāṇām vistareṇa ārocayati

original: evaṁ satvā kuśalasya karmasya vipākena deveṣu devānāṁ saṁpattīyo nubhavanti |
analyzed: evam satvā kuśalasya karmasya vipākena deveṣu devānām anubhavanti

original: taṁ pi anityaṁ duḥkhavipariṇāmadharmaṁ ||
analyzed: tam pi anityam duḥkha vipariṇāma dharmam

original: sarvaṁ ādīnavaṁ lokaṁ sarvaṁ lokaṁ ādīpitaṁ |
analyzed: sarvam ādīnavam lokam sarvam lokam ādīpitam

original: sarvaṁ prajvalitaṁ lokaṁ sarvalokaṁ prakampitaṁ ||
analyzed: sarvam prajvalitam lokam sarva lokam prakampitam

original: acalaṁ aprakampitaṁ sapṛthagjanasevitaṁ |
analyzed: acalam a prakampitam sa pṛthagjana sevitam

original: buddhā dharmaṁ deśayanti uttamārthasya prāptaye ||
analyzed: buddhāḥ dharmam deśayanti uttama arthasya prāptaye

original: tasmājjñātavyaṁ prāptavyaṁ boddhavyaṁ kartavyaṁ kuśalaṁ kartavyaṁ brahmacaryaṁ na ca vā loke kiñcitpāpaṁ karma karaṇīyanti vademi ||
analyzed: tasmāt jñātavyam prāptavyam boddhavyam kartavyam kuśalam kartavyam brahmacaryam na ca vā loke kiñcid pāpam karma karaṇīyanti vademi

original: sthavirasya śrutvā anekāni prāṇasahasrāṇi devamanuṣyāṇāṁ amṛtaṁ prāpayanti ||
analyzed: sthavirasya śrutvā anekāni prāṇa sahasrāṇi deva manuṣyāṇām amṛtam prāpayanti

original: (33) bhagavānsamyaksaṁbuddho yadarthaṁ samudāgato tadarthamabhisaṁbhāvayitvā rājagṛhe viha- rati gṛdhrakūṭe parvate śāstā devānāñca manuṣyāṇāṁ  #
analyzed: bhagavān samyaksabuddhaḥ yad artham samudāgataḥ tad artham abhisabhāvayitvā rājagṛhe viha gṛdhrakūṭe parvate śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām

original: ca satkṛto gurukṛto mānito pūjito apacito lābhāgrayaśograprāptaḥ lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapra- tyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṁ tatra  #
analyzed: ca satkṛtaḥ gurukṛtaḥ mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ apacitaḥ lābha agra yaśa ugra prāptaḥ lābhī cīvara piṇḍa pātra śayana āsana glāna pra tyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkārāṇām tatra

original: anupalipto padmamiva jale puṇyabhāgīyāṁ satvā puṇyehi niveśento phalabhāgīyāṁ satvāṁ phalehi pratiṣṭhāpayanto vāsanābhāgīyāṁ satvāṁ vāsanā-  #
analyzed: padmam iva jale puṇya bhāgīyām satvā puṇyehi niveśentaḥ phala bhāgīyām satvām phalehi pratiṣṭhāpayantaḥ vāsanā bhāgīyām satvām vāsanā

original: yāmavasthāpayanto amṛtavarṣeṇa devamanuṣyā saṁvibhajanto prāṇasahasrāṇi amṛtamanu- prāpayanto anavarāgrajātijarāmaraṇasaṁsārakāntānarakādidurgasaṁsārakāntāragraha-  #
analyzed: yām avasthāpayantaḥ amṛta varṣeṇa deva manuṣyā prāṇa sahasrāṇi amṛtam anu prāpayantaḥ

original: ṇadāruṇāto mahāprapātāto uddharitvā kṣeme sthale śame śive abhaye nirvāṇe prati- ṣṭhāpayanto āvarjayitvā aṅgamagadhāṁ vajjimallā kāśikośalāṁ  #
analyzed: mahā prapātātaḥ uddharitvā kṣeme sthale śame śive abhaye nirvāṇe prati sṭhāpayantaḥ āvarjayitvā aṅgamagadhām vajjimallā kāśikośalām

original: cetivatsamatsyāṁ śūrasenāṁ kurupaṁcālā śividaśārṇā ca aśvaka-avantī jñāneṣu parākramya svayaṁbhū divyehi vihārehi āniṁjehi vihārehi sāntatyehi  #
analyzed: cetivatsamatsyām śūrasenām kurupacālā śivi daśārṇā ca aśvaka avantī jñāneṣu parākramya divyehi vihārehi ānijehi vihārehi sāntatyehi

original: vihārehi buddho buddhavihārehi jino jinavihārehi jānako jānakavihārehi sarvajño sarvajñavihārehi cetovaśi- prāpto ca punarbuddho bhagavanto  #
analyzed: vihārehi buddhaḥ buddha vihārehi jinaḥ jina vihārehi jānakaḥ jānaka vihārehi sarvajñaḥ sarvajña vihārehi

original: yehi yehi vihārehi ākāṁkṣati viharituṁ tehi tehi vihārehi viharati ||
analyzed: yehi yehi vihārehi viharitum tehi tehi vihārehi viharati

original: atha so āyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyano kālyasyaiva nivāsa- yitvā rājagṛhaṁ nagaraṁ piṇḍāya prakrami ||
analyzed: atha saḥ āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ kālyasya eva nivāsa yitvā rājagṛham nagaram piṇḍāya

original: atha khalvāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya aciraprakrāntasya etadabhūṣīt ||
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmataḥ mahāmaudgalyāyanasya acira prakrāntasya etat abhūṣīt

original: atiprāgeva khalu tāvadetarhiṁ rājagṛhe nagare pi- (34)
analyzed: ati prāk eva khalu tāvat etarhim rājagṛhe nagare

original: ṇḍāya carituṁ yannūnāhaṁ yena śuddhāvāso devanikāyo tenupasaṁkrameyaṁ |
analyzed: caritum yat nūna aham yena śuddha āvāsaḥ devanikāyaḥ tena upasakrameyam

original: ciraṁ me śuddhāvāsaṁ devanikāyaṁ upasaṁkrāntasya ||
analyzed: ciram me śuddhāvāsam devanikāyam upasakrāntasya

original: atha khalvāyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyana padavī- tihāreṇa ṛddhīye yena śuddhāvāsaṁ devanikāyaṁ tena prakrāmi ||
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana padavī tihāreṇa ṛddhīye yena śuddhāvāsam devanikāyam tena prakrāmi

original: adrākṣuḥ sambahulā śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā āyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṁ dūrato yevāgacchantaṁ dṛṣṭvā ca punaryenāyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyano  #
analyzed: adrākṣuḥ sambahulā śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ deva putrāḥ āyuṣmantam mahāmaudgalyāyanam dūratas yā iva āgacchantam dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ

original: tena pratyudgatāsuḥ ||
analyzed: tena pratyudgatā asuḥ

original: ettha ettha āryo mahāmau- dgalyāyano |
analyzed: ettha ettha āryaḥ mahāmau dgalyāyanaḥ

original: svāgatamāryamahāmaudgalyāyanasya anurāgamāryasya mahāmaudgalyāyanasya |
analyzed: svāgatam ārya mahāmaudgalyāyanasya anurāgam āryasya mahāmaudgalyāyanasya

original: cirasya punaḥ āryo mahāmaudgalyāyano paryāyamakārṣīt yadidaṁ iha āgamanāya ||
analyzed: cirasya punar āryaḥ mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ paryāyam akārṣīt yat idam iha āgamanāya

original: atha khalu te saṁbahulā śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekamante sthitā |
analyzed: atha khalu te sa bahulā śuddhāvāsa kāyikā deva putrāḥ āyuṣmataḥ mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekam ante sthitā

original: tatra anyataro śuddhāvāsakāyiko deva- putro āyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanametadavocat ||
analyzed: tatra anyataraḥ śuddhāvāsa kāyikaḥ deva putraḥ āyuṣmantam mahāmaudgalyāyanam etat avocat

original: āścaryamidamārya mahāmaudgalyāyana adbhutamidamārya mahāmaudgalyāyana yāvadduḥkhasamudānīyā anuttarā samyaksaṁbodhiḥ yadidaṁ kalpānāṁ śatasahasreṇa
analyzed: āścaryam idam ārya mahāmaudgalyāyana adbhutam idam ārya mahāmaudgalyāyana yāvat duḥkha samudānīyā anuttarā samyaksabodhiḥ yat idam kalpānām śata sahasreṇa

original: atha khalu bhagavanso śuddhāvāsakāyiko devaputro āyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṁ adhyabhāṣi ||
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavan saḥ śuddhāvāsa kāyikaḥ deva putraḥ āyuṣmantam mahāmaudgalyāyanam adhyabhāṣi

original: kalpāna śatasahasraṁ abhiyo nāma bhikṣu sarāgo abhūṣi sadoṣo samoho ||
analyzed: śata sahasram abhiyaḥ nāma bhikṣu sa rāgaḥ sa doṣaḥ sa mohaḥ

original: tena khalu punaḥ maudgalyāyana samayena vasumataṁ (35)
analyzed: tena khalu punar maudgalyāyana samayena vasumatam

original: nāma nagaraṁ abhūṣi ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca kṣemaṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca ākīrṇajanamanuṣyaṁ ca sukhita- janamanuṣyaṁ ca bahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca praśāntadaṇḍaḍamaraṁ  #
analyzed: nāma nagaram abhūṣi ṛddham ca sphītam ca kṣemam ca subhikṣam ca ākīrṇa jana manuṣyam ca sukhita jana manuṣyam ca bahu jana manuṣyam ca praśānta daṇḍa ḍamaram

original: sunigṛhītataskaravyavahārasaṁpannaṁ ||
analyzed: su nigṛhīta taskara vyavahāra sapannam

original: vasumate khalu punarmaudgalyāyana mahānagare uttiyo nāma śreṣṭhī abhūṣi kṛtapuṇyo mahe- śākhyo āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo prabhūtasvāpateyo  #
analyzed: vasumate khalu punar maudgalyāyana mahā nagare uttiyaḥ nāma śreṣṭhī kṛta puṇyaḥ mahe śākhyaḥ āḍhyaḥ mahādhanaḥ mahā bhogaḥ prabhūta svāpateyaḥ

original: prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāro prabhūtajātarūparajatavittokaraṇo prabhūtahastyaśvagaveḍako prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapau- ruṣeyo bhagavato  #
analyzed: prabhūta dhana dhānya kośa koṣṭhāgāraḥ prabhūta jātarūpa rajata vitta ukaraṇaḥ prabhūta hasti aśva gaveḍakaḥ prabhūta dāsī dāsa karmakara pau bhagavataḥ

original: sarvābhibhusya śāsane śraddhāprasanno buddhadharmasaṁghamaṅgalo nandādīnāṁ bhikṣūṇāmabhiprasanno ||
analyzed: sarvābhibhusya śāsane śraddhā prasannaḥ buddha dharma sagha maṅgalaḥ nanda ādīnām bhikṣūṇām abhiprasannaḥ

original: atha khalu maudgalyāyana nando ca bhikṣuḥ abhiyo ca bhikṣuḥ uttiyasya śreṣṭhisya gṛhamupasaṁkrameyuḥ ||
analyzed: atha khalu maudgalyāyana nando ca bhikṣuḥ abhiyaḥ ca bhikṣuḥ uttiyasya śreṣṭhisya gṛham upasakrameyuḥ

original: nando maudgalyāyana bhikṣuḥ tasmiṁ śreṣṭhikule satkṛto abhūṣi gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ apacitaḥ na tathā abhiyo bhikṣuḥ ||
analyzed: nandaḥ maudgalyāyana bhikṣuḥ tasmin śreṣṭhi kule satkṛtaḥ abhūṣi gurukṛtaḥ mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ apacitaḥ na tathā abhiyaḥ bhikṣuḥ

original: uttiyasya khalu punaḥ maudgalyāyana śreṣṭhisya dhītā vasumate mahānagare anyatarasya gṛhapatimahāśālasya bhāryā abhūṣi |
analyzed: uttiyasya khalu punar maudgalyāyana śreṣṭhisya dhītā vasumate mahā nagare anyatarasya gṛhapati mahāśālasya bhāryā

original: sā maudgalyāyana nandasya bhikṣusya atīvābhi- prasannā abhūṣi ||
analyzed: sā maudgalyāyana nandasya bhikṣusya atīva abhi prasannā

original: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyo bhikṣuḥ nandaṁ bhikṣuṁ īrṣyāprakṛ- tena abhūtenābrahmacaryavādena anudhvaṁseti ||
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyaḥ bhikṣuḥ nandam bhikṣum īrṣyā prakṛ tena abhūtena abrahmacarya vādena anudhvasa iti

original: abrahmacārī nando bhikṣuḥ pāpadharmā asaṁyato praticchannapāpakarmānto |
analyzed: a brahmacārī nandaḥ bhikṣuḥ pāpa dharmā a sayataḥ praticchanna pāpa karmāntaḥ

original: uttiyasya śreṣṭhisya dhītuḥ sārddhaṁ vipraduṣṭo ||
analyzed: uttiyasya śreṣṭhisya dhītuḥ sārddham vipraduṣṭaḥ

original: taṁ (36) sevitaṁ vasumate mahānagare yaṁ mahājanakāyena śrotavyaṁ śraddhātavyaṁ manyensuḥ ||
analyzed: tam sevitam vasumate mahā nagare yam mahā jana kāyena śrotavyam śraddhātavyam manyensuḥ

original: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana nandaṁ bhikṣuṁ vasumate mahānagare brāhmaṇagṛhapatikā uttiyo ca śreṣṭhī na bhūyo tathā satkaritavyaṁ gurukartavyaṁ  #
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana nandam bhikṣum vasumate mahā nagare brāhmaṇa gṛhapatikāḥ ca śreṣṭhī na bhūyas tathā satkaritavyam gurukartavyam

original: mānayitavyaṁ pūjayitavyaṁ manyensuḥ yathā pūṁrva |
analyzed: mānayitavyam pūjayitavyam manyensuḥ yathā

original: labhyaṁ satpuruṣā pratyāgacchanti akuśalena karmaṇā vipratisārī bhavanti ||
analyzed: labhyam sat puruṣā pratyāgacchanti akuśalena karmaṇā bhavanti

original: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyasya bhikṣusya etadabhūṣi ||
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyasya bhikṣusya

original: nando bhikṣu vītarāgo vigatadoṣo vigatamoho araho mahābhāgo so ca maye īrṣyāprakṛtena abhūtenābra- hmacaryavādena anudhvaṁsito ||
analyzed: nandaḥ bhikṣu vīta rāgaḥ vigata doṣaḥ vigata mohaḥ arahaḥ mahābhāgaḥ saḥ ca īrṣyā prakṛtena a bhūtena a brahmacarya vādena anudhvasitaḥ

original: mayā bahuṁ apuṇyaṁ prasūtaṁ ||
analyzed: mayā bahum apuṇyam prasūtam

original: yannūnāhaṁ nandaṁ bhikṣuṁ kṣamāpeyaṁ bhagavato ca sarvābhibhusya antike atyayaṁ deśeyaṁ ||
analyzed: yat nūna aham nandam bhikṣum kṣamāpeyam bhagavataḥ ca sarvābhibhusya antike atyayam deśeyam

original: atha khalu mahāmaudga- lyāyana abhiyo bhikṣu nandaṁ bhikṣuṁ kṣamāpayāmāsa bhagavato ca sarvābhibhūsya antike atyayaṁ deśeti ||
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudga lyāyanaḥ abhiyaḥ bhikṣu nandam bhikṣum kṣamāpayāmāsa bhagavataḥ ca sarvābhibhūsya antike atyayam deśeti

original: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyo bhikṣuḥ yena uttiyo śreṣṭhi- stenopasaṁkramitvā uttiyaṁ śreṣṭhimetadavocat ||
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyaḥ bhikṣuḥ yena uttiyaḥ śreṣṭhiḥ stena upasakramitvā uttiyam śreṣṭhim etat avocat

original: iccheyamahaṁ gṛhapati bhagavato sarvābhi- bhūsya saśrāvakasaṁghasya adhikāraṁ kartuṁ dehi me arthamātraṁ ||
analyzed: iccheyam aham gṛhapati bhagavataḥ adhikāram kartum dehi me artha mātram

original: adāsi mahāmaudgalyāyana uttiyo śreṣṭhi abhiyasya bhikṣusya prabhūtaṁ hiraṇyaṁ suvarṇaṁ tadanye pi gṛhapatimahā- (37) śālāḥ ||
analyzed: mahāmaudgalyāyana śreṣṭhi abhiyasya bhikṣusya prabhūtam hiraṇyam suvarṇam tad anye gṛhapati mahā śālāḥ

original: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana vasumate mahānagare duve gandhikamahattarakā abhiyasya bhikṣusya abhiprasannā abhūṣi ||
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana vasumate mahā nagare duve gandhika mahattarakāḥ abhiyasya bhikṣusya abhiprasannāḥ

original: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyanabhiyo bhikṣu śatasahasrahasto yena te duve gandhikamahattarakā tenopasaṁkramitvā duve gandhikamahattarakāṁ etadavocat
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana bhiyaḥ bhikṣu śata sahasra hastaḥ yena te duve gandhika mahattarakā tena upasakramitvā duve gandhika mahattarakām etat avocat

original: icchāmi vāsiṣṭhāho imasya śatasahasrasya keśaraṁ |
analyzed: icchāmi vāsiṣṭha aho imasya śata sahasrasya keśaram

original: parihariyāhaṁ bhagavato sarvābhibhūsya saśrāvakasaṁghasya adhikāraṁ karomi ||
analyzed: aham bhagavataḥ sarvābhibhūsya sa śrāvaka saghasya adhikāram karomi

original: pariharensuḥ mahāmau- dgalyāyana te duve gandhikamahattarakā śatasahasrakeśaraṁ ||
analyzed: pariharensuḥ mahāmau dgalyāyana te śata sahasra kesaram

original: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyo bhikṣuḥ bhagavantaṁ sarvābhibhūṁ saśrāvakasaṁghaṁ prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīya-āsvā- danīyena santarpayitvā  #
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyaḥ bhikṣuḥ bhagavantam sarvābhibhūm sa śrāvaka sagham prabhūtena khādanīya bhojanīya āsvā danīyena santarpayitvā

original: saṁpracārayitvā bhuktāviṁ dhautapāṇiṁ apanītapātraṁ viditvā tena śatasahasrakeśareṇa bhagavantaṁ sarvābhibhūṁ saśrāvakasaṁghaṁ okiresi adhyokiresi  #
analyzed: sa pracārayitvā bhukta avim dhauta pāṇim apanīta pātram viditvā tena śata sahasra keśareṇa bhagavantam sarvābhibhūm sa śrāvaka sagham okiresi adhyokiresi  /

original: prakiresi okiritvā adhyokiritvā abhiprakiritvā evaṁ cittaṁ utpādesi ||
analyzed: prakiresi okiritvā adhyokiritvā abhiprakiritvā evam cittam utpādesi

original: aho punarahaṁ pi anāgatamadhvānaṁ bhaveyaṁ tathāgato araho samyaksaṁbuddho vidyācara- ṇasaṁpanno sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puraṣadamyasārathiḥ  #
analyzed: aho punar aham anāgatam adhvānam bhaveyam tathāgataḥ araho samyaksabuddhaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puraṣa damya sārathiḥ

original: śāstā devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca yathāyaṁ bhagavāṁ sarvābhibhū etarahesi ||
analyzed: śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca yathā ayam bhagavān sarva abhibhū

original: evaṁ dvātriṁśatmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇehi samanvā- gato bhaveyaṁ aśītihi anuvyaṁjanehi anuvirājitaśarīro aṣṭādaśāveṇikehi buddha- dharmehi samanvāgato  #
analyzed: evam dvātriśat mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇehi samanvā gataḥ bhaveyam aśītihi anuvyajanehi anuvirājita śarīraḥ aṣṭādaśa āveṇikehi buddha dharmehi samanvāgataḥ

original: daśahi tathāgatabalehi balavāṁ caturhi vaiśāradyehi viśārado (38)
analyzed: daśahi tathāgata balehi balavān caturhi vaiśāradyehi viśāradaḥ

original: yathāyaṁ bhagavānsarvābhibhū etarahesi ||
analyzed: yathā ayam bhagavān sarva abhibhū etarahā isi

original: evaṁ ca anuttaraṁ dharmacakraṁ pravarteyaṁ apravartitaṁ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacidvā punarloke saha  #
analyzed: evam ca anuttaram dharmacakram pravarteyam a pravartitam śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke saha

original: dharmeṇa evaṁ ca samagraṁ śrāvakasaṁghaṁ parihareyaṁ yathāyaṁ bhagavāṁ sarvābhibhū etarahesi ||
analyzed: dharmeṇa evam ca samagram śrāvaka sagham parihareyam yathā ayam bhagavām sarvābhibhū etarahā isi

original: evaṁ ca devamanuṣyā śrotavyaṁ śraddhātavyaṁ manyensuḥ yathā vedaṁ bhagavato sarvābhibhūsya etarahi ||
analyzed: evam ca deva manuṣyā śrotavyam śraddhātavyam manyensuḥ yathā vedam bhagavataḥ etarahi

original: evaṁ tīrṇo tāreyaṁ mukto mocayeyaṁ āśvasto āśvāseyaṁ parinirvṛto parinirvāpayeyaṁ taṁ bhaveyaṁ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai  #
analyzed: evam tīrṇaḥ tāreyam muktaḥ mocayeyam āśvastaḥ āśvāseyam parinirvṛtaḥ parinirvāpayeyam tam bhaveyam bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya loka anukampāyai

original: mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca ||
analyzed: mahataḥ jana kāyasya arthāya hitāya devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca

original: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavāṁ sarvābhibhū abhiyasya bhikṣo idamevarūpaṁ praṇidhānaṁ viditvā etadavocat ||
analyzed: atha khalu mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavām abhiyasya bhikṣo idam evarūpam praṇidhānam viditvā etat avocat

original: bhaviṣyasi tvaṁ abhiya anāgate dhvani śataśasrakalpe śākyamuni nāma tathāgato'rhansamyaksaṁbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṁpanno sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ  #
analyzed: bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate śata śasra kalpe śākyamuni nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksabuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa sapannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ

original: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca yathāpyahametarhi dvātriṁśatīhi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇehi samanvāgato aśī- tihi anuvyaṁjanehi virājitaśarīro  #
analyzed: puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca yathā api aham etarhi dvātriśatīhi mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇehi samanvāgataḥ tihi anuvyajanehi virājita śarīraḥ

original: aṣṭādaśehi āveṇikehi buddhadharmehi samanvā- gato daśatathāgatabalehi balavāṁ caturhi vaiśāradyehi suviśārado yathāpi ahaṁ eta- rahi ||
analyzed: aṣṭādaśehi āveṇikehi buddha dharmehi samanvā gataḥ daśa tathāgata balehi balavān caturhi vaiśāradyehi su viśāradaḥ yathā api aham

original: evaṁ ca anuttaraṁ dharmacakraṁ pravartayiṣyasi apravartitaṁ śramaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā kenacidvā punarloke saha dharmeṇa |
analyzed: evam ca anuttaram dharmacakram pravartayiṣyasi a pravartitam śramaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā kenacid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa

original: evaṁ ca samagraṁ śrāvakasaṁghaṁ parihari- (39)
analyzed: evam ca samagram śrāvaka sagham

original: ṣyasi yathāpyahametarhi |
analyzed: ṣyasi yathā api aham etarhi

original: evaṁ ca te devamanuṣyā śrotavyaṁ śraddhātavyaṁ manyensuḥ yathāpi mama etarahi |
analyzed: evam ca te deva manuṣyā śrotavyam śraddhātavyam manyensuḥ yathā api mama etarahi

original: evaṁ tīrṇo tārayiṣyasi mukto mocayiṣyasi āśvasto āśvāsayi- ṣyasi parinirvṛto parinirvāpayiṣyasi yathāpi ahaṁ etarahiṁ |
analyzed: evam tīrṇaḥ tārayiṣyasi muktaḥ mocayiṣyasi āśvastaḥ āśvāsayiṣyasi parinirvṛtaḥ parinirvāpayiṣyasi yathā api aham etarahim

original: taṁ bhaviṣyasi bahu- janahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukaṁpāya mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca ||
analyzed: tam bhaviṣyasi bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya loka anukapāya mahataḥ jana kāyasya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca

original: samanantaravyākṛto ca punaḥ mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyo bhikṣuḥ sarvābhibhūnā samyaksaṁbuddhena anuttarāye samyaksaṁbuddhāya athāyaṁ trisāhasramahā-  #
analyzed: ca punar mahāmaudgalyāyana abhiyaḥ bhikṣuḥ sarvābhibhūnā samyaksabuddhena anuttarāye samyaksabuddhāya atha ayam tri sāhasra mahā

original: sāhasro lokadhātuḥ kaṁpe prakaṁpe atīva ṣaḍvikāraṁ |
analyzed: sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ kape prakape atīva ṣaṣ vikāram

original: purastimā diśā unnamati paścimā diśā onamati purastimā diśā onamati paścimā diśā unnamati dakṣiṇā diśā unnamati uttarā diśā onamati dakṣiṇā  #
analyzed: purastimā diśā unnamati paścimā diśā onamati purastimā diśā onamati paścimā diśā unnamati dakṣiṇā diśā unnamati uttarā diśā onamati dakṣiṇā

original: diśā onamati uttarā diśāa unnamati madhyāto onamati anteṣu unnamati madhyāto unnamati anteṣu ona- mati ||
analyzed: diśā onamati uttarā diśāa unnamati madhyātaḥ onamati anteṣu unnamati madhyātaḥ unnamati anteṣu

original: bhūmyā ca devā ghoṣamudīrayensuḥ śabdamanuśrāvayensuḥ ||
analyzed: bhūmyā ca devāḥ ghoṣam udīrayensuḥ śabdam anuśrāvayensuḥ

original: eṣo'bhiyo bhikṣuḥ bhagavatā sarvābhibhūnā samyaksaṁbuddhena anuttarāye samyaksaṁbodhaye vyākṛto taṁ bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya  #
analyzed: eṣaḥ abhiyaḥ bhikṣuḥ bhagavatā sarvābhibhūnā samyaksabuddhena anuttarāye samyaksabodhaye bhaviṣyati bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya

original: lokānukampāya mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca ||
analyzed: loka anukampāya mahataḥ jana kāyasya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca

original: bhūmyānāṁ devānāṁ ghoṣaṁ śrutvā antarīkṣecarā devā caturmahārājikā devā trāyastriṁśā devā yāmā tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayo parani- rmitavaśavartino  #
analyzed: bhūmyānām devānām ghoṣam śrutvā antarīkṣecarāḥ devā caturmahārājikāḥ devā trāyastriśāḥ devāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇa ratayaḥ

original: devā yāva brahmakāyikā devā ghoṣamudīrayensuḥ śabdamanuśrāvayensuḥ ||
analyzed: devāḥ brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ ghoṣam udīrayensuḥ śabdam anuśrāvayensuḥ

original: (40) evaṁ mārṣā abhiyo bhikṣu bhagavatā sarvābhibhūnā anuttarāye samyaksaṁbodhaye vyākṛto taṁ bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya  #
analyzed: evam mārṣāḥ bhagavatā anuttarāye samyaksabodhaye bhaviṣyati bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya loka anukampāya

original: mahato janakāyasyā- rthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca aprameyasya udārasya ca mahato avabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo abhūṣi |
analyzed: mahataḥ jana kāyasya rthāya hitāya sukhāya devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca aprameyasya udārasya ca mahataḥ avabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvaḥ

original: yā ca tā loke lokāntarikā andhakārā andhakārārpitā tamisrā tamisrārpitā aghā asaṁviditā asaṁviditapūrvā yatra ime pi candramasūryā evaṁ maharddhikā  #
analyzed: yā ca tā loke loka āntarikā andhakārā andhakāra arpitā tamisrā tamisra arpitā aghā a saviditā a savidita pūrvā yatra ime pi candrama sūryāḥ evam maharddhikā  /

original: mahānubhāvā ābhayā ābhāṁ nābhisaṁbhuṇanti ālokena vā ālokaṁ akāle api tenāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhunsuḥ ||
analyzed: mahā anubhāvāḥ ābhayā ābhām na abhisabhuṇanti ālokena vā ālokam akāle api tena avabhāsena sphuṭāḥ abhunsuḥ

original: ye pi tatra satvā upapannā te pi anyamanyaṁ saṁjalyeṣu ||
analyzed: ye pi tatra satvāḥ upapannā te pi anyam anyam sajalyeṣu

original: anye pi kila bho iha satvā upapannā anye pi kila bho iha satvā upapannā anye pi kila bho iha satvā upapannā ||
analyzed: anye pi kila bho iha satvāḥ upapannāḥ anye pi kila bho iha satvāḥ upapannāḥ anye pi kila bho iha satvāḥ upapannāḥ

original: ekāntasukhasamarpi- tā ca punastatkṣaṇaṁ tatmuhūrtaṁ sarve satvā abhunsuḥ ye pi avīcīsmiṁ mahānarake upapannā atikramya yeva devānāṁ devānubhāvaṁ  #
analyzed: ekānta sukha samarpi tā ca punar tad kṣaṇam tad muhūrtam sarve satvāḥ abhunsuḥ ye pi avīcīsmin mahā narake upapannāḥ atikramya yā iva devānām deva anubhāvam

original: nāgānāṁ nāgānubhāvaṁ yakṣāṇāṁ yakṣānubhāvaṁ ||
analyzed: nāgānām nāga anubhāvam yakṣāṇām yakṣa anubhāvam

original: dhyāmāni ca abhunsuḥ mārabhavanāni nistejāni nirabhiramyāni |
analyzed: dhyāmāni ca abhunsuḥ māra bhavanāni nistejāni nirabhiramyāni

original: krośikāni (41) pi ca khaṇḍāni prapatensuḥ dvikrośikāni pi ca trikrośikāni pi ca khaṇḍāni prapa- tensuḥ yojanikāni pi ca khaṇḍāni prapatensuḥ  #
analyzed: krośikāni pi ca khaṇḍāni prapatensuḥ dvi krośikāni pi ca tri krośikāni pi ca khaṇḍāni prapa tensuḥ yojanikāni pi ca khaṇḍāni prapatensuḥ

original: dvepaṁcayojanikāni pi ca khaṇḍāni prapatensuḥ ||
analyzed: ca khaṇḍāni prapatensuḥ

original: māro ca pāpīmāṁ duḥkhī durmano vipratisārī antaḥśalyaparidāghajāto abhūṣi ||
analyzed: ca pāpī imām duḥkhī durmanaḥ vipratisārī antaḥśalya paridāgha jātaḥ

original: anugītagāthā ||
analyzed: anugīta gāthā

original: so taṁ dānaṁ datvā praṇidhesi lokanāyako asya |
analyzed: saḥ tam dānam da tvā loka nāyakaḥ asya

original: devamanuṣyācāryo āryaṁ dharmaṁ prakāśeyaṁ ||
analyzed: deva manuṣya ācāryaḥ āryam dharmam prakāśeyam

original: dharmolkāṁ vicareyaṁ parāhaṇe dharmabherīṁ sapatākāṁ |
analyzed: dharma ulkām vicareyam parāhaṇe dharma bherīm sa patākām

original: ucchreyaṁ dharmaketuṁ āryaṁ śaṁkhaṁ prapūreyaṁ ||
analyzed: ucchreyam dharma ketum āryam śakham prapūreyam

original: evaṁ ca mahyaṁ asyā prakāśanā deśanā ca dharmasya |
analyzed: evam ca mahyam asyā prakāśanā deśanā ca dharmasya

original: evaṁ ca bahū satvā ārye dharme niveśeyaṁ ||
analyzed: evam ca bahū satvāḥ ārye dharme niveśeyam

original: evaṁ ca me śruṇensuḥ devamanuṣyā subhāṣitaṁ vākyaṁ |
analyzed: evam ca me śruṇensuḥ deva manuṣyā su bhāṣitam vākyam

original: evaṁ ca dharmacakraṁ pravartaye bahujanahitāya ||
analyzed: evam ca dharmacakram pravartaye bahu jana hitāya

original: kṛcchrāpannaiḥ satvaiḥ jātijarāpīḍitairmaraṇadharmaiḥ |
analyzed: kṛcchra āpannaiḥ satvaiḥ jāti jarā pīḍitaiḥ maraṇa dharmaiḥ

original: bhavacakṣukaiḥ apāyā prajñāskandhaṁ niveśeyaṁ ||
analyzed: bhava cakṣukaiḥ prajñā skandham niveśeyam

original: saṁjīve kālasūtre saṁghāte raurave avīcismiṁ |
analyzed: sa jīve kālasūtre sa ghāte raurave avīcismin

original: ṣaṭsu gatīhi vikīrṇāṁ bhavasaṁsārātpramoceyaṁ ||
analyzed: ṣaṭsu gatīhi vikīrṇām bhava sa sārāt pramocā iyam

original: (42) narake pakvavipakvā apāyaprapīḍitāṁ maraṇadharmā |
analyzed: narake pakva vipakvā apāya prapīḍitām maraṇa dharmā

original: alpasukhaduḥkhabahulāṁ bhavasaṁsārātpramoceyaṁ ||
analyzed: alpa sukha duḥkha bahulām bhava sa sārāt pramocā iyam

original: arthaṁ careyaṁ loke devamanuṣyāṇāṁ deśiya dharmaṁ |
analyzed: artham careyam loke deva manuṣyāṇām deśiya dharmam

original: evaṁ vineya satvāṁ yathā ayaṁ lokapradyoto ||
analyzed: evam vineya satvām yathā ayam loka pradyotaḥ

original: evaṁ ahaṁ lokamimaṁ careyaṁ yathā ayaṁ carati asaṁgamānaso |
analyzed: evam aham lokam imam careyam yathā ayam carati asaga mānasaḥ

original: cakraṁ ca varteya ananyasādṛśo susatkṛto devamanuṣyapūjito ||
analyzed: cakram ca varteya an anya sādṛśaḥ su satkṛtaḥ deva manuṣya pūjitaḥ

original: praṇidhiṁ ca jñātvā susamudgato jino sarvehi hetūbhi upasthitehi |

original: sṛṣṭarūpaḥ praśastaguṇarāśiḥ meghasvaraḥ hemavarṇaḥ sundaravarṇaḥ mṛgarājaghoṣaḥ āśukārī dhṛtarāṣṭragatiḥ lokābhilāṣitaḥ jitaśatruḥ supūjitaḥ  #

original: yaśarāśiḥ ami- tatejaḥ sūryaguptaḥ candrabhānuḥ niścitārthaḥ kusumaguptaḥ padmābhaḥ prabhaṁkaraḥ dīptatejaḥ satva- (136)

original: supātraḥ sarvabandhaḥ ratnamukuṭaḥ citramukuṭaḥ sumukuṭaḥ varamukuṭaḥ calamakuṭaḥ vimalamukuṭaḥ lokaṁdharaḥ vipulojaḥ aparibhinnaḥ puṇḍarīkanetraḥ  #

original: sarvasahaḥ brahmaguptaḥ subrahmaḥ amaradevaḥ arimardanaḥ candrapadmaḥ candrābhaḥ candratejaḥ susomaḥ sumudrabuddhiḥ ratanaśṛṅgaḥ sucandradṛṣṭiḥ  #

original: pranaṣṭaduḥkhaḥ samadṛṣṭiḥ dṛḍhadevaḥ yaśaketuḥ citracchadaḥ cārucchadaḥ lokaparitrātā duḥkhamuktaḥ rāṣṭradevaḥ rudradevaḥ bhadraguptaḥ udāgataḥ  #
analyzed: pranaṣṭa duḥkhaḥ samadṛṣṭiḥ dṛḍhadevaḥ yaśaketuḥ citracchadaḥ cārucchadaḥ lokaparitrātā duḥkhamuktaḥ rāṣṭradevaḥ rudradevaḥ bhadraguptaḥ udāgataḥ  /

original: bhagavāndharmadhātuḥ guṇaketuḥ jñānaketuḥ satyaketuḥ puṣpaketuḥ vajrasaṁghātaḥ dṛḍhahanuḥ dṛḍhasandhiḥ atyuccagāmī vigataśatruḥ citramālaḥ  #
analyzed: bhagavān dharmadhātuḥ guṇaketuḥ jñānaketuḥ satyaketuḥ puṣpaketuḥ vajra saghātaḥ dṛḍhahanuḥ dṛḍhasandhiḥ atyucca gāmī vigata śatruḥ citra mālaḥ  /

original: ūrdhvasadhniḥ guṇaguptaḥ ṛṣiguptaḥ pralambabāhuḥ ṛṣidevaḥ sunetraḥ sāgaradharapuruṣaḥ sulocanaḥ ajitacakraḥ unnataḥ ajitapuṣyalaḥ purāṣaḥ maṅgalyaḥ  #

dṛḍhaśaktiḥ harṣadattaḥ yaśadattaḥ nāgabāhuḥ vigatareṇuḥ śāntareṇuḥ dānapraguruḥ udāttavarṇaḥ bala- (137)

original: bāhuḥ amitaujaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ devalokābhilāṣitaḥ pratyagrarūpaḥ devarājaguptaḥ dāmodaraḥ dharmarājaḥ caturasravadanaḥ yojanābhaḥ padmoṣṇīṣaḥ  #
analyzed: bāhuḥ amita ojaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ deva loka abhilāṣitaḥ pratyagra rūpaḥ devarāja guptaḥ dāmodaraḥ dharmarājaḥ caturasravadanaḥ yojana ābhaḥ padma uṣṇīṣaḥ  /

original: sphuṭavikramaḥ rājahaṁsagāmī svala- kṣaṇamaṇḍitaḥ śiticūḍaḥ maṇimakuṭaḥ praśastavarṇaḥ devābharaṇaḥ kalpaduṣyaguptaḥ sādhurūpaḥ akṣatabuddhiṁ  #

original: lokapadmaḥ gambhīrabuddhiḥ śakrabhānuḥ indradhvajaḥ dānavakulaḥ manuṣyadevaḥ manuṣyadattaḥ somacchatraḥ ādityadattaḥ yāmaguptaḥ nakṣatraguptaḥ  #

original: śubhadantaḥ suvimaladantaḥ suvadanaḥ kulanandanaḥ janakṣatriyaḥ lokakṣatriyaḥ anantaguptaḥ dharmaguptaḥ sūkṣmavastraḥ dvitīyaṁ śatamāryapakṣasya
analyzed: śubha dantaḥ su vimala dantaḥ su vadanaḥ kula nandanaḥ jana kṣatriyaḥ loka kṣatriyaḥ anantaguptaḥ dharmaguptaḥ sūkṣma vastraḥ dvitīyam śatam ārya pakṣasya

original: pratyāsanna- buddhiḥ satvasahaḥ manuṣyanāgaḥ upasenaḥ suvarṇacārī prabhūtavarṇaḥ subhikṣākāntaḥ bhikṣudevaḥ prabuddhaśīlaḥ nahīnagarbhaḥ anālambhaḥ  #

original: ratanamudraḥ hārabhūṣitaḥ prasiddhavedanaḥ sugandhivastraḥ suvijṛmbhitaḥ amitalocanaḥ udāttakīrtiḥ sāgararājaḥ mṛgadevaḥ kusumahesthaḥ ratna-  #
analyzed: ratanamudraḥ hārabhūṣitaḥ prasiddha vedanaḥ sugandhivastraḥ suvijṛmbhitaḥ amitalocanaḥ udāttakīrtiḥ sāgararājaḥ mṛgadevaḥ kusumahesthaḥ ratna

original: śṛṅgaḥ citravarṇaḥ padmarajavarṇaḥ samantagandhaḥ udāraguptaḥ praśāntarogaḥ pradakṣiṇārthaḥ saṁkṣiptabuddhiṁ anantacchatraḥ yojanasahasradarśī  #
analyzed: śṛṅgaḥ citra varṇaḥ padma raja varṇaḥ samanta gandhaḥ udāra guptaḥ praśānta rogaḥ pradakṣiṇa arthaḥ sa kṣipta buddhim ananta chatraḥ yojana sahasra darśī

original: utpalapadmanetraḥ atipuruṣaḥ anivarti- kabalaḥ svaguṇaśākhaḥ saṁcitoraḥ mahārājaḥ cārucaraṇaḥ prasiddharaṁgaḥ trimaṅgalaḥ (138)

analyzed: suvarṇasenaḥ vartita arthaḥ asakīrṇaḥ devagarbhaḥ suprīti aratiḥ vimāna rājā parimaṇḍana arthaḥ deva satvaḥ vipulatara āśaḥ salīla gaja gāmī virūḍha bhūmiḥ iti

original: iti śrīmahāvastu-avadāne aṣṭamā bhūmiḥ samāptā ||
analyzed: iti śrī mahāvastu avadāne aṣṭamā bhūmiḥ samāptā

original: tato bhūyo dhutadharmadhara ato nantaraṁ bhagavāñcitrabhānuḥ cārubhānuḥ dīptabhānuḥ rucitabhānuḥ asitabhānuḥ hemarathaḥ cāmīkaragauraḥ rajakarathaḥ  #
analyzed: tatas bhūyas dhutadharmadhara atas nantaram bhagavān citrabhānuḥ cārubhānuḥ dīptabhānuḥ rucitabhānuḥ asitabhānuḥ hema rathaḥ cāmīkaragauraḥ rajaka rathaḥ  /

original: suyakṣaḥ akṣobhyaḥ apariśrotavāhanaḥ devālaṁkṛtaḥ subhūṣitakhaṇḍaḥ śithilakuṇḍalaḥ maṇikarṇaḥ sulakṣaṇaḥ suviśuddhaḥ vimalajendraḥ devacūḍaḥ  #
mandāravagandhaḥ pataṁgacaraḥ cārugandhaḥ indracūrṇaḥ śailarājaketuḥ arimardanaḥ maṇicakraḥ vimalottarīyaḥ satyābharaṇaḥ dṛḍhavīryaḥ nandiguptaḥ  #
ānandamālaḥ cakravālaguptaḥ dṛḍhamūlaḥ ānandacandraḥ brahmadhvaṁsadevaḥ saumbhavatsabāhuḥ samīkṣitavadanaḥ satyāvatāraḥ supratiṣṭhitabuddhiḥ  #
hāraśītalāṁgaḥ sukhaprabhaḥ bhūrisatvaḥ bhadraguptaḥ candraśubhaḥ bhadratejaḥ iṣṭarūpaḥ cakravartidattaḥ suvicakṣaṇagātraḥ vaiśrāvaṇarājā samṛddhayajñaḥ  #
analyzed: sukhaprabhaḥ bhūrisatvaḥ bhadraguptaḥ candraśubhaḥ bhadratejaḥ iṣṭarūpaḥ cakravarti dattaḥ su vicakṣaṇa gātraḥ vaiśrāvaṇa rājā samṛddha yajñaḥ

original: saṁmataraśmiḥ darśanakṣamaḥ srajamālādhārī suvarṇaviṣāṇaḥ bhūtārthaketuḥ ratna- rudhiraketuḥ mahārṣacūḍaḥ tejaguptaḥ varuṇarājaḥ udāttavastraḥ  #
vajraguptaḥ dhanyabhānuḥ utta- ptarāṣṭraḥ viśālaprabhaḥ lokasundaraḥ abhirūpaḥ hiraṇyadhanyaśirikaḥ prabhūtadehakarṇaḥ (139)

analyzed: prāgajitaḥ vicitramukuṭaḥ dānavaguptaḥ rāhuvamī puṇyarāśiḥ salilaguptaḥ śamitaśatruḥ ratnayūpaḥ suvikalpāṅgaḥ ajitabalaḥ satyanāmaḥ aviraktarāṣṭraḥ  /

original: vaiśvānaraguptaḥ madhura- vadanaḥ kusumotpalaḥ uttarakururājaḥ añjalimālādhārī dhanapatiguptaḥ taruṇārkabhānuḥ anurūpagātraḥ ratnakaraṇḍaketuḥ  #
analyzed: vaiśvānara guptaḥ madhura vadanaḥ kusuma utpalaḥ uttara kuru rājaḥ añjali mālā dhārī dhanapati guptaḥ taruṇa arka bhānuḥ anurūpa gātraḥ ratna karaṇḍaketuḥ  /

original: mahākośaḥ bahulakeśaḥ puṣpamaṁjarimaṇḍitaḥ anapavi- ddhakarṇaḥ anāviddhavarṇaḥ sitāsitalocanaḥ araktapravāḍaḥ siṁhoraskaḥ ariṣṭanemiḥ bahurājā
analyzed: mahā kośaḥ bahula keśaḥ puṣpa majari maṇḍitaḥ an apaviddha karṇaḥ an āviddha varṇaḥ sita asita locanaḥ a rakta pravāḍaḥ siha uraskaḥ ariṣṭa nemiḥ bahu rājā

original: navamāyāṁ bhūmau prathamaṁ śatamāryapakṣe ||
analyzed: navamāyām bhūmau prathamam śatamārya pakṣe

original: bhūmidevaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ sādhuprabhaḥ jyotiguptaḥ bahuprabhaḥ satyaṁvacaḥ bhavadevaguptaḥ saṁvṛttatejaḥ nirupaghātaḥ jānu- trastaḥ ratnaśayanaḥ  #
analyzed: bhūmidevaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ sādhuprabhaḥ jyotiguptaḥ bahuprabhaḥ satyavacaḥ bhavadevaguptaḥ savṛttatejaḥ nirupaghātaḥ jānu trastaḥ ratnaśayanaḥ  /

original: kusumaśayanaḥ citraśayanaḥ dantaśayanaḥ supratiṣṭhitacaraṇaḥ sarvadevaguptaḥ arajottarīyaḥ svāyaṁbhavendraḥ prasannavarṇaḥ bhavaketuḥ kṣīrapūrṇāmbhaḥ  #
anantabuddhiḥ kanaka- nāgarājatejaḥ bandhanāntakaraḥ anugravarṇakṣemaguptaḥ jinakāntāraḥ vimalaḥ marīcijālaḥ ajitasenarājā kanakarāśiḥ gauraḥ  #
padmamālaḥ rājakṣetraguptaḥ samapakṣaḥ cāturdevaḥ devaguptaḥ puṣkalāṅgaḥ dvijātirājaḥ bahusenaḥ kumudagandhaḥ śavalāśvaḥ ṣaḍviṣāṇapātaḥ surabhicandanaḥ  #
rājā sahasradātā abhayadevaḥ arinihantā vimalaśikharaḥ durāro- habuddhiḥ yajñakoṭiguptaḥ ratnacaṁkramaḥ jālāntaraḥ pariśuddhakarmaḥ kāmadevaḥ  #
analyzed: rājā sahasra dātā abhaya devaḥ ari nihantā vimala śikharaḥ durāraḥ ha buddhiḥ yajña koṭi guptaḥ ratna cakramaḥ jāla antaraḥ pariśuddha karmaḥ kāmadevaḥ  /

original: gururatnaḥ (140)
śatasahasramātā śuciprarohaḥ stimitarājā vṛddhadevaḥ gurujanapūjitaḥ jayantadevaḥ sujā- tabuddhiḥ samīkṣitārtha ujitaparaḥ devābhikaḥ asuradevaḥ  #
gandharvagītaḥ vīṇāravaghoṣaḥ śuddhadantaḥ sudantaḥ cārudantaḥ amṛtaphalaḥ mārgodyotayitā maṇikuṇḍaladharaḥ hemajā- laprabhaḥ nāgabhogabāhuḥ  #
kamaladharaḥ aśokasatvaḥ lakṣmīputraḥ sunirmitarūpaḥ īśvaraguptaḥ lokapālarājā sunidhyānaḥ agrapuruṣaḥ anihatavarṇaḥ kundapuṣpagandhaḥ aṁkuśaḥ  #

original: ārdra- vallipratirūpaḥ kāryatāvicāraḥ svatejadīptaḥ prakāśadharmaḥ āryavaṁśaketuḥ devarājaprabhaḥ pratyakṣadevaḥ ahibhānurāgaḥ kusumottarīyaḥ  #

analyzed: snigdha gātraḥ parama artha satvaḥ aklinna gātraḥ dharma śūraḥ su tīrthaḥ loka aloka nihata mallaḥ kunda puṣpa gandhaḥ nirakuśaḥ anotapta gātraḥ upādhyāya rājā  /

original: pravarāgramatiḥ anabhibhūtayaśaḥ anupacchinnālambhaḥ devaguruḥ ratnapuṣpaḥ śuddhasatvaḥ vaiḍūryaśikharaḥ citramālyaḥ sugandhakāyaḥ anantakośaḥ  #

original: samamathitaḥ satyaprabhaḥ adīnagāmī suvikrāntaḥ asaṁbhrāntavacanaḥ gurudevaḥ naradevaḥ naravāhanaḥ ratnahastaḥ lokapriyaḥ parinditārthaḥ aviśuṣkamūlaḥ  #
analyzed: samamathitaḥ satya prabhaḥ adīna gāmī su vikrāntaḥ asabhrānta vacanaḥ gurudevaḥ naradevaḥ naravāhanaḥ ratnahastaḥ loka priyaḥ parindita arthaḥ aviśuṣka mūlaḥ  /

original: aparitṛṣitaḥ sarva- śilparājaḥ grahakośaḥ anuraktarāṣṭraḥ śivadattamālaḥ śikharadattaḥ citramālaḥ mahāvi- mānaḥ anotaptagātraḥ citrahemajālaḥ  #
analyzed: aparitṛṣitaḥ sarva śilpa rājaḥ grahakośaḥ anurakta rāṣṭraḥ śivadattamālaḥ śikharadattaḥ citramālaḥ anotaptagātraḥ citra hemajālaḥ

original: śāntarajaḥ saṁgṛhītapakṣaḥ aprakṛṣṭaḥ raktacandranagandhaḥ acalitasumanaḥ upacitahanu jvalitayaśā racitamālaḥ śiramakuṭaḥ tejaguptarājā ||

original: manujabhavamabhikāṁkṣamāṇāḥ mātuḥ kukṣimavataranti apunāvartamevamādīni kṛtvā saṁkīrtaya paramapuḍgalānāmāścaryādbhuta- dharmā asādhāraṇā pratyekabuddhādibhiḥ  #

analyzed: mātuḥ pṛṣṭham niśrāya tiṣṭhanti

original: viṣṭambhitayā bho dhutadharmadhara kusūtraṁ pravāḍavaiḍūryamaṇimupālambya na kvacidupalabhyate pradeśastu asti sarvaśastathā bodhisatvā mātuḥ  #
analyzed: viṣṭambhi tayā bho dhuta dharma dhara kusūtram pravāḍa vaiḍūrya maṇim upālambya na kvacid upalabhyate pradeśaḥ tu asti sarvaśas tathā bodhisatvāḥ mātuḥ

analyzed: bo dhisatvam punar khalu bho dhutadharmadhara mātuḥ kukṣi gatam deva saghāḥ upasakramya pṛcchanti pravhāḥ kṛta ajali puṭāḥ su muhūrtam su divasam

analyzed: na kho punar bho dhutadharmadhara bodhisatvāḥ mātuḥ kukṣi gatāḥ utkuṭakena pārśvena vā yathā kathacid vā sthitāḥ bhavanti

analyzed: atha khalu bho dhutadharmadhara bodhisatvāḥ jitvā niṣaṇāḥ bhavanti mātaram ca na bādhanti

original: bodhisatvāḥ kho punarbho dhutadharmadhara mātuḥ kukṣigatā va santo bhavavādikathāṁ kathayanti kuśalamūlata iti ||
analyzed: bodhisatvāḥ kho punarbho dhutadharmadhara mātuḥ kukṣi gatāḥ santaḥ bhava vādi kathām kathayanti kuśala mūlataḥ iti

original: bodhisa- tvasya khalu punarbho dhutadharmadhara mātuḥ kukṣigatasya pūjārthaṁ satatasamitaṁ divyāni tūryāṇi vādyanti na kadāciddivā vā rātrau  #

analyzed: dharmadhara mātuḥ kukṣi gatam pūjā artham apsara śata sahasrāṇi sandarśayanti divyam puṣpa varṣam divyam cūrṇa varṣam na uparamante kadācid

original: atha khalu bho dhutadharmadhara samyaksaṁbuddhāḥ satyavādi kālavādi bhūtavādi arthavādi tathāvādi ananyathāvādi avitathavādi dharmavādi vinayavādi  #

original: śraddadhāmi taṁ te deva evametaṁ na anyathā prasīda bhava me nātha abhayaṁ parimocaya ||
analyzed: śraddadhāmi tam te deva evam etam na anyathā prasīda bhava me nātha abhayam parimocaya

original: tadvasāntaḥpurāmātyaḥ śāstā me apratipudgalaḥ |
analyzed: tad vasā antaḥpura amātyaḥ śāstā me aprati pudgalaḥ

analyzed: vinaya vaśī tava asmi tathā anyā janatā bahu

original: paropahāra ityeṣastena paramabuddhinā vṛtto anugrahārthāya satvānāṁ varabuddhinā |
analyzed: para upahāraḥ iti eṣaḥ tena parama buddhinā vṛttaḥ anugraha arthāya satvānām vara buddhinā

original: devī kusumbharājasya kusumā iti viśrutā |
analyzed: devī kusumbha rājasya kusumā iti viśrutā

original: iṣṭā kusumbharājasya strīsahasrāṇamuttamā ||
analyzed: iṣṭā kusumbha rājasya

original: tasya mātā pitā caiva jīrṇā daṇḍaparāyaṇā |
analyzed: tasya mātā pitā ca eva jīrṇā daṇḍa parāyaṇā

original: dhītaramevamāhansu kusume putri he śṛṇu ||
analyzed: dhītaram evam āhansu kusume putri he śṛṇu

analyzed: vayam jīrṇā tuvam bālā kāma pralulitā asi

analyzed: icchema pratisṛjyantau icchema maraṇam ātmanaḥ

original: etacca vacanaṁ śrutvā kusumā labhate mataṁ |
analyzed: etat ca vacanam śrutvā kusumā labhate matam

analyzed: avarṇaḥ yam mama asyāḥ praghātyate

analyzed: dāsyāmi viṣa sayuktam bhaktam eṣām su dāruṇam

original: bhuktvā yena ubhāvetau mariṣyanti na saṁśayaḥ ||
analyzed: bhuktvā yena ubhau etau mariṣyanti na saśayaḥ

original: yadāsyā niścitā buddhi mātāpitṛṣu dāruṇā |
analyzed: yadā asyāḥ niścitā mātā pitṛṣu dāruṇā

analyzed: utpādaye śāstā kāruṇyam kusumām prati

analyzed: tatas kusumāye śāstā mātaram pitaram tathā

analyzed: apanāmayati sabuddhaḥ anyau sthāpeti nirmitau

analyzed: kusumā viṣa sayuktam tam bhojanam āpadyati

analyzed: nirmitān āha ambā ca bhojanam

analyzed: a vikampamānāḥ bhujanti bhojanam jina nirmitāḥ

original: dvitīyaṁ divasaṁ caiva tṛtīyaṁ caturthaṁ paṁcamaṁ |
analyzed: dvitīyam divasam ca eva tṛtīyam caturtham pacamam

original: viṣasaṁyuktaṁ bhuktvāna sudhāṁ va yāpenti nirmitau ||
analyzed: sudhām nirmitau

original: tataḥ kṛtāṁjalī bhūtvā kusumā nirmitāṁ bravīt |

original: ātmānaṁ me nivedayatha anugrāhyā yadi ahaṁ ||
analyzed: ātmānam me nivedayatha anugrāhyāḥ yadi aham

original: tāṁ yācamānāṁ prāñjalikāṁ kusumāṁ nirmitā bravīt |
analyzed: tām yācamānām prāñjalikām kusumām nirmitā bravīt

original: p. 182 yā tavāpatti jānātha tathā ca anutiṣṭhatha ||
analyzed: yā tava āpatti jānātha tathā ca anutiṣṭhatha

analyzed: buddhaḥ puruṣa śārdūlaḥ dvātriśa vara lakṣaṇaḥ

original: utpannaḥ kulasaṁpannaḥ sarvavidyāguṇānvitaḥ ||
analyzed: utpannaḥ kula sapannaḥ sarva vidyā guṇa anvitaḥ

analyzed: viditam vādi sihasya atra vijaha saśayam

analyzed: prāsāda varam āruhya sa strī āgāraḥ sa pārthivaḥ

analyzed: tam sarva guṇa sampannam vanditvā śaraṇam vraje

analyzed: tatas asmākam yam tatra eva pṛccasi vakṣyate jino

analyzed: sādhu iti nirmitām prati saḥ tadā

analyzed: rājā śīghram prāsādam abhirūḍhavān

original: imāṁ vyāharate rājā vācāṁ kusumayā saha ||
analyzed: imām vyāharate rājā vācām kusumayā saha

analyzed: ye sarva gauṇa sapannāḥ lokānām anukampakā

analyzed: gṛhītāḥ atyantam teṣām sā ajalī saumanasyakā

original: tato amantraye śāstā śrāvakāṁchāsane ratāṁ |
analyzed: tatas amantraye śāstā ratām

original: cāruvarṇaṁ siṁhahanuṁ dṛḍhabāhuṁ aninditaṁ ||
analyzed: cāru varṇam siha hanum dṛḍha bāhum aninditam

original: kīrtimantaṁ mahānāgaṁ ca cāturantaṁ mahābalaṁ |
analyzed: kīrtimantam mahā nāgam ca cāturantam mahā balam

analyzed: nīla keśam ca vṛddham ca śāntam śāstra viśāradam

original: tathā śārasamatulyaṁ guptakāmamaninditaṁ |
analyzed: tathā śārasam atulyam gupta kāmam aninditam

analyzed: siha nandim viśāla akṣam lakṣaṇeyam anuttamam

original: eṣa bhikṣavo gacchāmi śāstāramanubandhatha |

analyzed: kusumām pramukhām kṛtvā vineṣyāmi bahum janam

analyzed: parivārayitvā sa buddham idam vacanam āhu te

analyzed: anuyāsyāma sabuddham yatra gacchati cakṣumān

analyzed: nimeṣa antareṇa sa prāptaḥ bhagavān

analyzed: deva sagham ca manasā dhyāye dhyāna viśāradaḥ

analyzed: ca kusumā devī prahvī sugatam abravīt

analyzed: eṣā te prāñjalī nātha pādān icchāmi vanditum

original: tataḥ pratiṣṭhito śāstā prāsādavaramūrdhani |
analyzed: tatas śāstā prāsāda vara mūrdhani

analyzed: prabhayā ca diśā sarvāḥ abhibhūya yasyaskaraḥ

analyzed: ca kusumā devī saha rājñā

analyzed: vandate ca deviye nara puṅgavam

analyzed: śaraṇam tvām nara śreṣṭha gacchāma sura vandita

analyzed: mātaram pitaram hatvā kīdṛśam labhate phalam

analyzed: śṛṇohi kusume satyam mātā pitṛ vadhe phalam

analyzed: anantaram mahāvīcim narakam upapadyate

original: tato buddhānubhāvena śāstā vadathakovidaḥ |
analyzed: tatas buddha anubhāvena śāstā vadatha kovidaḥ

original: kusumāyā mahāvīciṁ upadarśeti nāyakaḥ ||
analyzed: kusumāyāḥ mahāvīcim upadarśa iti nāyakaḥ

original: tato ca kusumā devī nirayaṁ trasya dāruṇaṁ |
analyzed: ca kusumā devī nirayam trasya dāruṇam

original: aśruvegaṁ pramuñcantī idaṁ vacanamabravīt ||
analyzed: aśru vegam pramuñcantī idam vacanam abravīt

original: mātāpitṛbhyāṁ kāruṇikā duṣṭacittasya kīdṛśaṁ |
analyzed: mātā pitṛbhyām kāruṇikā duṣṭa cittasya kīdṛśam

analyzed: para loke phalam bhavati yat satyam tat udīraya

analyzed: duṣṭa cittasya kusume tam cittam

analyzed: tat eva para lokasmin phalam sadyam ca hisayā

analyzed: puratas dharmarājasya prīti sukha samarpitā

analyzed: āsvādam bhāṣate sarva kovidaḥ

analyzed: kāmānām niḥsaraṇam bhāṣate cintya vikramaḥ

original: guṇānvadati nirvāṇe adbhutāṁ bhūtadarśimān ||
analyzed: guṇān vadati nirvāṇe adbhutām bhūta darśimān

original: kusumāṁ pramukhāṁ kṛtvā koṭīyo dvādaśa muniḥ |
analyzed: kusumām pramukhām kṛtvā koṭīyaḥ dvādaśa muniḥ

original: mānuṣāṇāṁ vinayati upahāro ayaṁ iti ||
analyzed: mānuṣāṇām vinayati upahāraḥ ayam iti

original: dhruvo nāma abhūcchreṣṭhī nagare kāśivardhane |
analyzed: dhruvaḥ nāma abhūt śreṣṭhī nagare kāśivardhane

original: tasyedaṁ darśanaṁ pāpaṁ mātāpitṛsamāgame ||
analyzed: tasya idam darśanam pāpam mātā pitṛ samāgame

original: yo mātaraṁ ca pitaraṁ ca jīrṇakaṁ gatayauvanaṁ |
analyzed: yaḥ mātaram ca pitaram ca jīrṇakam gata yauvanam

original: p. 185 jñātipakṣaṁ samānetvā bhakṣyabhojyena tarpayet ||
analyzed: jñāti pakṣam samānetvā bhakṣya bhojyena tarpayet

original: agniskandhe ca jvalite dāhayeya pitṝnubhau |
analyzed: agni skandhe ca jvalite dāhayeya pitṝn ubhau

original: upahāro vidhātavyo tasya puṇyamanantakaṁ ||
analyzed: upahāraḥ tasya puṇyam anantakam

original: rākṣasīnāṁ sahasrāṇi nāyako abhinirmiṇi |
analyzed: rākṣasīnām sahasrāṇi

original: prāsādavarasuptasya dhruvasya purataḥ sthitā ||
analyzed: prāsāda vara suptasya dhruvasya puratas sthitā

original: daṇḍahastā kaśāhastā śaktihastā tathaiva ca |
analyzed: daṇḍa hastā kaśā hastā śakti hastā tathā eva ca

original: kuṭhārahastā asihastā ulkāhastā tathaiva ca ||
analyzed: kuṭhāra hastā asi hastā ulkā hastā tathā eva ca

original: atha tomarahastā ca nārācaśatapāṇiyo |
analyzed: atha tomara hastā ca nārāca śata pāṇiyaḥ

original: kuntamudgarahastāśca śreṣṭhisya purataḥ sthitāḥ ||
analyzed: kunta mudgara hastāḥ ca śreṣṭhisya puratas sthitāḥ

original: dhikkṛtāṁ dhikṛtāṁ dṛṣṭiṁ prāpto si puruṣādhamā |
analyzed: dhikkṛtām dhikṛtām dṛṣṭim prāptā u si puruṣa adhamā

original: dhikṛtaṁ mithyātvamāsādya na śraddadhitumarhasi ||
analyzed: dhikṛtam mithyātvam āsādya na śraddadhitum arhasi

original: ye te duṣkarakartāraḥ ye te pūrvopakāriṇaḥ |
analyzed: ye te duṣkara kartāraḥ ye te pūrva upakāriṇaḥ

original: maitracittā āpanneṣu teṣu tvaṁ vadhamicchasi ||
analyzed: maitracittāḥ āpanneṣu teṣu tvam vadham icchasi

original: yeṣāṁ na śakyaṁ pratikartuṁ apatyena kathaṁ cana |
analyzed: yeṣām na śakyam pratikartum apatyena katham cana

original: sarvaratnaṁ pi dadatā teṣāṁ tvaṁ vadhamicchasi ||
analyzed: sarva ratnam dadatā teṣām tvam vadham icchasi

original: jīvitātte mṛtaṁ śreyo na ca darśanamīdṛśaṁ |
analyzed: jīvitāt te mṛtam śreyaḥ na ca darśanam īdṛśam

original: yaḥ tvaṁ supuruṣācīrṇaṁ darśanaṁ pratibādhase ||
analyzed: yaḥ tvam su puruṣa ācīrṇam darśanam pratibādhase

original: adya te jīvitaṁ nāsti sabhāryasya sabandhunaḥ |
analyzed: adya te jīvitam na asti sa bhāryasya sa bandhunaḥ

original: sabhṛtyasya saputrasya pretya ca nirayaṁ gatiḥ ||
analyzed: sa bhṛtyasya sa putrasya pretya ca nirayam gatiḥ

original: imaṁhi nāma evaṁ vā māriṣa bhadramastu vaḥ |
analyzed: imahi nāma evam vā māriṣa bhadram astu vaḥ

original: mithyādarśanasampannaṁ mūḍhāpaṇḍitamānasaṁ ||
analyzed: mithyā darśana sampannam mūḍha apaṇḍita mānasam

original: p. 186 parāṁ anyāṁ pi janatāṁ grāhentaṁ pāpadarśanaṁ |
analyzed: p parām anyām pi janatām grāhentam pāpa darśanam

original: dhruvaṁ śreṣṭhiṁ vināśema āryadarśanakutsakaṁ ||
analyzed: dhruvam śreṣṭhim vināśema ārya darśana kutsakam

original: etantu vacanaṁ śrutvā dhruvo udvignamānasaḥ |
analyzed: etat tu vacanam śrutvā dhruvaḥ udvigna mānasaḥ

original: svasvinnagātro prahvaśca babhūva trastamānasaḥ ||
analyzed: prahvaḥ ca babhūva trasta mānasaḥ

original: bhrāntacitto diśovekṣī trasto bhavati mānasaḥ |
analyzed: bhrānta cittaḥ diśaḥ uvekṣī trastaḥ bhavati mānasaḥ

original: kṛtāṁjalipuṭo bhūtvā idaṁ vacanamabravīt ||
analyzed: kṛta ājali puṭaḥ bhūtvā idam vacanam abravīt

original: rakṣogaṇo prasīdaṁtu parivārasya mahya ca |
analyzed: rakṣaḥ gaṇaḥ prasīdatu parivārasya ca

original: yuṣme gatiśca lenaśca mama śaraṇameva ca ||
analyzed: yuṣme gatiḥ ca lenaḥ ca mama śaraṇam eva ca

original: ājñāpayatha kiṁ kṛtvā mahyādya abhayaṁ bhave |
analyzed: ājñāpayatha kim kṛtvā mahya adya abhayam bhave

original: mama sabanduvargasya na cāgaccheya durgatiṁ ||
analyzed: mama sabandu vargasya na ca āgaccheya durgatim

original: te ca bravīnsu bhūtagaṇā dhruvaṁ śreṣṭhiṁ nabhe sthitā |
analyzed: te ca bravīn su bhūta gaṇāḥ dhruvam śreṣṭhim nabhe sthitā

original: mā asmākaṁ śaraṇaṁ gaccha tameva śaraṇaṁ vraja ||
analyzed: mā asmākam śaraṇam gaccha tam eva śaraṇam vraja

original: hitaiṣiṇaṁ sarvabhūtānāṁ buddhaṁ dhutajanārcitaṁ |
analyzed: hita eṣiṇam sarva bhūtānām buddham dhuta jana arcitam

original: sarvalokottaraṁ vādiṁ śākyasiṁhaṁ manoramaṁ ||
analyzed: sarva loka uttaram vādim śākyasiham manoramam

original: kahinnu so........ bhagavāṁ bhūtavandito |
analyzed: kahin nu saḥ bhagavān bhūta vanditaḥ

original: vayaṁ pi taṁ naraśreṣṭhaṁ gacchema śaraṇaṁ muniṁ ||
analyzed: vayam tam nara śreṣṭham gacchema śaraṇam munim

original: eṣo sarvaguṇopetaḥ pure ratanakholake |
analyzed: sarva guṇa upetaḥ pure rata nakholake

original: nānākusumasaṁchanne udyāne gandhamādane ||
analyzed: nānā kusuma sa channe udyāne gandhamādane

original: vaśībhūtasahasrāṇāṁ navatīhi puraskṛto |
analyzed: vaśībhūta sahasrāṇām navatīhi puraskṛtaḥ

original: vihārakuśalo dhīro tatra viharate muniḥ ||
analyzed: vihāra kuśalaḥ tatra viharate muniḥ

original: p. 187 taṁ tvaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāhi sarvehi jñātibhiḥ saha |
analyzed: tam tvam śaraṇam gacchāhi sarva ihi jñātibhiḥ saha

original: taṁ ca paśya narādityaṁ tāṁ ca dṛṣṭiṁ parityaja ||
analyzed: tam ca paśya nara ādityam tām ca dṛṣṭim parityaja

original: yaṁ ca so deśate dharmaṁ dṛṣṭāntavihitaṁ śubhaṁ |
analyzed: yam ca saḥ deśate dharmam dṛṣṭānta vihitam śubham

original: taṁ ca prajñāya paśyāhi evante jīvitaṁ bhavet ||
analyzed: tam ca prajñāya paśyāhi eva ante jīvitam bhavet

original: agatvā ca tuvaṁ śreṣṭhi na dhruvaṁ pratipatsyase |
analyzed: a gatvā ca tuvam śreṣṭhi na dhruvam pratipatsyase

original: idante maraṇaṁ sadyaṁ taṁ śraddhāno samācara ||
analyzed: id ante maraṇam sadyam tam samācara

original: tataḥ śreṣṭhi sabandhujano bhūtvā sudīnamānaso |
analyzed: tatas sa bandhu janaḥ bhūtvā su dīna mānasaḥ

original: mūrdhninā patito bhūmau yato so puruṣottamaḥ ||

analyzed: iti śrīmahāvastu avadāne abhiṣekavatī nāma daśamā bhūmiḥ samāptā

original: dīpaṁkaravastusyādiḥ |

original: ito mahāmaudgalyāyana aparimite asaṁkhyeye kalpe rājā arcimāṁ nāma abhūṣi cakravartī kṛtapuṇyo maheśākhyo saptaratnasamanvāgato cāturdvīpo  #

original: tasya sapta ratanāni abhūt |
analyzed: tasya sapta ratanāni abhūt

original: tadyathā cakraratnaṁ hastiratanaṁ aśvaratnaṁ maṇiratanaṁ strīratanaṁ gṛhapatiratnaṁ pariṇāyakaratanaṁ evaṁ saptaratnaṁ ||
analyzed: tat yathā cakra ratnam hasti ratanam aśva ratnam maṇi ratanam strī ratanam gṛhapati ratnam pariṇāyaka ratanam evam sapta ratnam

original: pūrṇaṁ cāsya putra sahasraṁ abhūṣi śūrāṇāṁ vīrāṇāṁ varāṅgarūpiṇāṁ parasainyapramardakānāṁ ||

original: arcimato khalu punaḥ mahā p.194 maudgalyāyana rājño dīpavatī nāma rājadhānī abhūṣi dvādaśa yojanāni āyāmena purastimena ca paścimena ca sapta  #
analyzed: arcimataḥ khalu punar mahā maudgalyāyana rājñaḥ dīpavatī nāma rājadhānī dvādaśa yojanāni āyāmena purastimena ca paścimena ca sapta

original: yojanāni vistāreṇa dakṣiṇena ca uttareṇa ca saptahi prākārehi parikṣiptā abhūṣi sauvarṇehi suvarṇapracchannehi ||

original: vātaṁ pi yeṣa calitaṁ śruṇiya krodhaṁ samutpatati agnisamo ||
analyzed: vātam calitam krodham samutpatati

original: teṣāmanantaragatāḥ thapitā yakṣāḥ pradīptaśikharā vikṛtā |
analyzed: teṣām anantara gatāḥ thapitāḥ yakṣāḥ pradīpta śikharā vikṛtā

original: ye duṣṭacittā vinivārayātha mā ca vadhaṁ kurutha kasyacāpi ||
analyzed: ye duṣṭa cittāḥ vinivāraya atha mā ca vadham kurutha kasyaca api

original: teṣāmantantarasthitā balavāṁ gandharvasaṁgho śubharūpadharāḥ |
analyzed: teṣām antantara sthitāḥ śubha rūpa dharāḥ

original: ārakṣahetu śubhacāpadharā varalakṣaṇā vipulabuddhimato ||
analyzed: śubha cāpa dharāḥ vara lakṣaṇāḥ

original: catvāri lokapatino sthapitā gagane svayaṁparivāreṇa saha |
analyzed: catvāri gagane svaya parivāreṇa saha

original: adya cyaviṣyati kila bhagavāṁ lokasya arthasukhavṛddhikaro ||
analyzed: adya cyaviṣyati kila bhagavān lokasya

original: tridaśehi sārdhaṁ tridaśapravaro sthitu antarīkṣe varacakradharo |
analyzed: tridaśehi sārdham tridaśa pravaraḥ sthitu antarīkṣe vara cakra dharaḥ

original: aciraṁ cyaviṣyati cyutiṁ caramāṁ ākāṁkṣamāṇa sukhaṁ apratimaṁ ||
analyzed: aciram cyaviṣyati cyutim caramām ākākṣamāṇa sukham apratimam

original: devīya mūle bahu devagaṇā kṛtvā daśāṁguliṁ natābhimukhā |
analyzed: mūle bahu deva gaṇā kṛtvā daśa agulim nata abhimukhā

original: samudīrayanti vacanaṁ madhuraṁ ullokayanti tuṣiteṣu jinaṁ ||
analyzed: samudīrayanti vacanam madhuram ullokayanti tuṣiteṣu jinam

original: vyavadānasannicitapuṇyabalā samayo khu antimamupetu bhavaṁ |
analyzed: vyavadāna sannicita puṇya balā

original: sajjā tāva bhavati te jananī anukampa dāni duḥkhitāṁ janatāṁ ||
analyzed: sajjā tāva bhavati te jananī anukampa dāni duḥkhitām janatām

original: p.205 eṣo cyavāmi iti muṁci girāṁ śubhaṁ vacanaṁ udīrayi........ |
analyzed: eṣā u cyavāmi iti muci girām śubham vacanam

original: atha supinaṁ janani jinasya tasmiṁ kṣaṇe paśyate varavipākaphalaṁ ||
analyzed: atha supinam janani jinasya tasmin kṣaṇe paśyate vara vipāka phalam

original: himarajatanibho se ṣaḍviṣāṇo sucaraṇacārubhujo suraktaśīrṣo |
analyzed: hima rajata nibhaḥ se ṣaṣ viṣāṇaḥ su caraṇa cāru bhujaḥ su rakta śīrṣaḥ

original: udaramupagato gajapradhāno lalitagatiḥ anavadyagātrasandhiḥ ||
analyzed: udaram upagataḥ gaja pradhānaḥ lalita gatiḥ anavadya gātra sandhiḥ

original: na khalu punarmahāmaudgalyāyana bodhisattvā kālapakṣe mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmanti |
analyzed: na khalu punar mahāmaudgalyāyana bodhisattvāḥ kāla pakṣe mātuḥ kukṣim avakrāmanti

original: atha pūrṇāyāṁ pūrṇamāsyāṁ puṣyanakṣatrayogayuktāyāṁ bodhisatvā mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmanti ||
analyzed: atha pūrṇāyām pūrṇamāsyām puṣya nakṣatra yoga yuktāyām bodhisatvāḥ mātuḥ kukṣim avakrāmanti

original: upoṣadhikāyāṁ ārohasampannāyāṁ pariṇāhasampannāyāṁ vyaktāyāṁ agrayauvanamaṇḍaprāptāyāṁ vinītāyāṁ bahuśrutāyāṁ smṛtāyāṁ samprajānāyāṁ sarvākārapradakṣiṇacittāyāṁ  #
analyzed: upoṣadhikāyām āroha sampannāyām pariṇāha sampannāyām vyaktāyām agra yauvana maṇḍa prāptāyām vinītāyām bahu śrutāyām smṛtāyām samprajānāyām sarva ākāra pradakṣiṇa cittāyām

original: sarvākārapratirūpāyāṁ pramadottamāyāṁ bodhisatvā mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmanti ||
analyzed: sarva ākāra pratirūpāyām pramadā uttamāyām bodhisatvāḥ mātuḥ kukṣim avakrāmanti

original: bodhisatvena mahāmaudgalyāyana tuṣitabhavanagatena cyavanakāle prabhā osṛṣṭā yāye prabhāye sarvaṁ buddhakṣetraṁ obhāsitaṁ ||
analyzed: bodhisatvena mahāmaudgalyāyana tuṣita bhavana gatena cyavana kāle prabhā osṛṣṭā yāye prabhāye sarvam buddhakṣetram obhāsitam

original: devaputro devaputraṁ pṛccati ||
analyzed: deva putraḥ deva putram pṛccati

original: kiṁ kāraṇaṁ suravareṇa prabhā pramuktā candrāṁśuśītalatarā kanakāvadātā |
analyzed: kim kāraṇam suravareṇa prabhā pramuktā candra āśu śītalatarā kanaka avadātā

original: yenāsureśvaragaṇā manujeśvarāśca prahlāditā ca narakā jvalanārcikalpā ||
analyzed: yena asura īśvara gaṇāḥ manuja īśvarāḥ ca prahlāditā ca narakāḥ jvalana arci kalpā

original: so dāni āha ||
analyzed: saḥ dāni āha

original: ye tatra tatra janatāṁ pratipālayanti saṁsārapaṁjaragatāṁ madanābhibhūtāṁ |
analyzed: ye tatra tatra janatām pratipālayanti sa sāra pajara gatām madana abhibhūtām

original: teṣāṁ vimokṣakaraṇena mahāyaśena āmantraṇārthaṁ anaghena prabhā pramuktā ||
analyzed: teṣām vimokṣa karaṇena mahā yaśena āmantraṇa artham anaghena prabhā pramuktā

original: p.206 bodhisatvo āha ||
analyzed: bodhisatvaḥ āha

original: muṁcatha amarā purāṇi na kila prāmodyasya ayaṁ kālaḥ |
analyzed: mucatha amarā purāṇi na kila prāmodyasya ayam kālaḥ

original: jarāmaraṇapuraṁ bhettuṁ kālo jñānaprahāreṇa ||
analyzed: jarā maraṇa puram bhettum kālaḥ jñāna prahāreṇa

original: bodhisatvo smṛto saṁprajāno pradakṣiṇacitto mātuḥ kukṣimavakrānto iti ||
analyzed: bodhisatvaḥ smṛtaḥ sa prajāno pradakṣiṇa cittaḥ mātuḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ iti

original: so nadīya siṁhanādaṁ narasiṁho cyavanakālasamayasmiṁ |
analyzed: saḥ siha nādam narasihaḥ cyavana kāla samayasmin

original: antarahito kṣaṇena narendrabhavane samutpadye ||
analyzed: kṣaṇena narendra bhavane samutpadye

original: yo so tuṣitaṁ kāyaṁ obhāseti śubhena varṇena |
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ tuṣitam kāyam śubhena varṇena

original: devapurāccyavamāno anativaro lokapradyotaḥ ||
analyzed: deva purāt cyavamānaḥ an ativaraḥ loka pradyotaḥ

original: sabrahmakaṁ ca lokaṁ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇā prajā sarvā |
analyzed: sa brahmakam ca lokam sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇā prajā sarvā

original: varṇenobhāseti anativaraḥ lokapradyoto ||
analyzed: varṇena ubhāsā iti an ativaraḥ loka pradyotaḥ

original: āscaryamadbhutamidaṁ paśyatha yāvat maharddhikaḥ śāstā |
analyzed: āscaryam adbhutam idam paśyatha yāvat maharddhikaḥ śāstā

original: smṛtimāṁ susaṁprajāno mātuḥ kukṣismiṁ okrānto ||
analyzed: smṛtimān su sa prajānaḥ mātuḥ kukṣismin okrāntaḥ

original: yāvacca naravarapravara uttamalakṣaṇasamaṁgi asthāsi |
analyzed: yāvat ca nara vara pravaraḥ uttama lakṣaṇa samagi asthāsi

original: mātāye kuṣkismiṁ smṛtimatimāṁ saṁprajāno ca ||
analyzed: kuṣkismim ca

original: samanantaraukrānte ca mahāmaudgalyāyana bodhisatve mahāsatve mātuḥ kukṣismiṁ iyaṁ mahāpṛthivī atīva ṣaḍvikāraṁ kampe saṁkampe prakampe saṁharṣaṇīyaṁ  #
analyzed: samanantara aukrānte ca mahāmaudgalyāyana bodhisatve mahāsatve mātuḥ kukṣismin iyam mahā pṛthivī atīva ṣaṣ vikāram kampe sa kampe prakampe sa harṣaṇīyam

original: ca kampe darśanīyaṁ ca harṣaṇīyaṁ ca modanīyaṁ ca premaṇīyaṁ ca prahlādanīyaṁ ca nirvarṇanīyaṁ ca ullokanīyaṁ ca p.207 āsecanakaṁ ca apratikūlaṁ  #
analyzed: ca kampe darśanīyam ca harṣaṇīyam ca modanīyam ca premaṇīyam ca prahlādanīyam ca nirvarṇanīyam ca ullokanīyam ca āsecanakam ca a pratikūlam

original: ca prāsādikaṁ ca prasaraṇīyaṁ ca nirudvegaṁ ca niruttrāsaṁ ca ||
analyzed: ca prāsādikam ca prasaraṇīyam ca nirudvegam ca niruttrāsam ca

original: kampamānā ca punarna kaṁcitsatvaṁ vyābādhati yamidaṁ jaṁgamaṁ sthāvaraṁ vā ||
analyzed: kampamānā ca punar na kacid satvam vyābādhati yam idam jagamam sthāvaram vā

original: tato ayaṁ sāgaramerumaṇḍalā prakampitā ṣaḍvidhamāsi medinī |
analyzed: tatas ayam sāgara meru maṇḍalā prakampitā ṣaḍvidha māsi medinī

original: kṛto ca loko vimalo manoramo mahāndhakārāpanudasya tejasā ||
analyzed: ca lokaḥ vimalaḥ manoramaḥ mahā andhakārāpanudasya tejasā

original: so yaṁ mahānubhāvo smṛtimāṁ tuṣitabhavanāccyavitvāna |
analyzed: saḥ yam mahā anubhāvaḥ smṛtimān tuṣita bhavanāt cyavitvāna

analyzed: gajarūpi

original: vīraśayane śayantiye poṣadhikāye viśuddhavasanāye |
analyzed: vīra śayane śayantiye poṣadhi kāye viśuddha vasanāye

analyzed: smṛtaḥ sa prajāno kuśalaḥ mātuḥ kukṣismin okrāntaḥ

analyzed: sā ca rajanī prabhāte ākhyāsaḥ bhartunaḥ manāpasya

analyzed: rāja vara pāṇḍaraḥ me gaja rājā

analyzed: sarve bhaṇātha bhūtam phala vipākam

analyzed: hṛṣṭaḥ bhavāsi nara vara yasya tava kulasmin

analyzed: pṛthivīdhara vara garbhaḥ anupama satvaḥ mahā satvaḥ

analyzed: paurāṇānām ācāryāṇām svayam samupāhṛtam

analyzed: dve sya gatayaḥ ananyāḥ bhavanti nara vīra śārdūla

original: bodhisatve khalu punarmahāmaudgalyāyana mātuḥ kukṣigate yāvanto suvarṇarājāno suvarṇādhipatayo te sarve bodhisatvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptīye autsukyamāpadyensuḥ
analyzed: bodhisatve khalu punar mahāmaudgalyāyana mātuḥ kukṣi gate yāvantaḥ suvarṇa rājānaḥ suvarṇa adhipatayaḥ te sarve bodhisatvasya rakṣā āvaraṇa guptīye autsukyam āpadyensuḥ

analyzed: mā kocī ahita eṣī namuci bala nudam vihiseya

analyzed: śakraḥ devānām indraḥ suyāmaḥ pi deva putraḥ satuṣitaḥ pi deva putraḥ sunirmitaḥ pi deva putraḥ vaśavartī pi deva putraḥ mahābrahmā pi śuddhāvāsaḥ pi deva putraḥ

analyzed: bodhisatvasya mātuḥ kukṣi gatasya rakṣā āvaraṇa guptīye autsukyam āpadyensuḥ

analyzed: manoramam dīpavatī puram uttamam kṛtam anuviśantaḥ ihi

analyzed: su bahuni bahuguṇasya ārakṣā artham niṣaṇāni

analyzed: mahābrahmā āha

analyzed: prasūyate sā naradeva garbham saḥ bhavati rājā vara cakravartī

original: kiṁ dharesi ||

original: sā āha ||
analyzed: sā āha

original: cakravartinti ||
analyzed: cakravartinti

analyzed: kukṣim prabhāsayantam kanaka vapum pravara lakṣaṇa samagim

analyzed: dhāremi cakravartim vara puruṣam rāja śārdūlam

analyzed: gajam ratna śreṣṭham madana bala vega apanayanam pradīpam lokasya tam a timira moha apanayanam

original: guṇānāṁ koṣaṁ tvaṁ aparimitaratnākaradharaṁ dhareṣi rājarṣiṁ apratihatacakraṁ amararuciṁ ||
analyzed: guṇānām koṣam tvam aparimita ratna ākara dharam dhareṣi rājarṣim apratihata cakram amara rucim

analyzed: devī āha

original: yatha mama na rāgadoṣā prasanti narendragarbhamupalabhya |
analyzed: mama na rāga doṣā narendra garbham upalabhya

original: bhagavato dīpaṁkarasya yā ca meghena māṇavena paṁca utpalāni kṣiptā yā ca prakṛtīye māṇavikāye yā ca anyāye janatāye kṣiptā taṁ bhagavato puṣpavitānamadhiṣṭhitaṁ  #

original: satvānāṁ vaineyavaśena meghasya ca māṇavasya prītiprāmodyasaṁjananārthaṁ prāsādiko darśanīyo catuḥsthūṇo catuḥdvāro osaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpo ||
analyzed: satvānām vaineya vaśena meghasya ca māṇavasya prīti prāmodya sa janana artham prāsādikaḥ darśanīyaḥ catur sthūṇaḥ catur dvāraḥ osakta paṭṭa dāma kalāpaḥ

original: meghasya tāni jalajāni bhagavato prabhāmaṇḍalasyopari samantena sthitāni dṛṣṭvā prāsādikāni prasadaniyāni prītiprāmodyaṁ kāye utpadye udāro  #

original: so kamaṇḍalumekānte nikṣipitvā ajinaṁ ca prajñapetvā bhagavato dīpaṁkarasya krameṣu praṇipatitvā keśehi pādatalāni saṁparimārjanto evaṁ cittamutpādeti
analyzed: saḥ kamaṇḍalum ekānte nikṣipitvā ajinam ca prajñapetvā bhagavataḥ dīpa karasya krameṣu praṇipatitvā keśehi pāda talāni sa parimārjantaḥ evam cittam utpāda iti

original: aho punaraṁ pi bhaveyaṁ anāgatamadhvānaṁ tathāgato'rhaṁ samyaksaṁbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṁpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā  #
analyzed: aho bhaveyam anāgatam adhvānam tathāgataḥ arham samyaksabuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa sapannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā  /

original: devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca yathāyaṁ bhagavāṁ dīpaṁkaro etarahiṁ ||
analyzed: devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca yathā ayam bhagavān dīpa karaḥ

original: evaṁ dvātriṁśatīhi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇehi samanvāgato bhaveyaṁ aśītihi anuvyaṁjanehi upaśobhitaśarīro aṣṭādaśahi āveṇikehi buddhadharmehi samanvāgato  #

original: evaṁ ca anuttaraṁ dharmacakraṁ pravarteyaṁ yathāyaṁ bhagavāṁ dīpaṁkaro etarahiṁ ||

original: atha mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavāndīpaṁkaro meghasya māṇavasya anuttareṇa buddhajñānena mahāsamudāgamanaṁ ca jñātvā kuśalamūlasambhāraṁ ca cetopraṇidhānaṁ  #

analyzed: bhaviṣyasi tvam māṇava anāgatam adhvānam aparimite asakhyeye kalpe śākyānām kapilavastusmin nagare śākyamuniḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arham samyaksabuddhaḥ

original: vidyācarasaṁpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca yathāpyahametarhiṁ dvātriṁśatīhi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇehi  #

original: samanvāgato aśītihi anuvyaṁjanehi upaśobhitaśarīro aṣṭādaśehi āveṇikehi buddhadharmehi samanvāgato daśahi tathāgatabalehi balavāṁ caturhi vaiśāradyehi  #

analyzed: itas mahāmaudgalyāyana bhadra kalpātaḥ aparimite aprameye asakhyeye kalpe dīpakara atas anantaram maṅgalaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arham samyaksabuddhaḥ udapāsi

analyzed: dvitīyaḥ śrāvaka sannipātaḥ navati sarveṣām arhatām kṣīṇa āśravāṇām uṣita vratānām samyagājñāsu vimukta cittānām parikṣīṇa bhava sayojanānām

analyzed: anuprāpta svaka arthānām

original: sace vāsiṣṭha vaiśalakā lecchavayo bhagavato rājagṛhāto vaiśāliṁ gacchantasya evaṁ pratyudgamanaṁ karonti yāvatsvakaṁ vijitaṁ yathāhamanuyānaṁ  #

original: sace vaiśālakā lecchavayo bhagavato rājagṛhāto vaiśāliṁ gacchantasya evaṁ pratyudgamanaṁ karonti yāvatsvakaṁ vijitaṁ yathā ahamanuyānaṁ karomi  #
analyzed: sace vaiśālakāḥ leccha vayaḥ bhagavataḥ rājagṛhātaḥ vaiśālim gacchantasya evam pratyudgamanam karonti yāvat svakam vijitam yathā aham anuyānam karomi  /

original: sādhu bhagavantamanujānāhi vaiśāliṁ gamanāya anukampāmupādāya ||
analyzed: sādhu bhagavantam anujānāhi vaiśālim gamanāya anukampām upādāya

original: bhagavāṁ dāni rājñā śreṇiyena bimbisāreṇa anujñāto vaiśāliṁ gamanāya amātyā ca āṇattā yāva ca rājagṛhaṁ yāva ca gaṁgāyāḥ tīrthaṁ mārgaṁ pratijāgṛtha  #
analyzed: bhagavān dāni rājñā śreṇiyena bimbisāreṇa anujñātaḥ vaiśālim gamanāya amātyā ca āṇattā yāva ca rājagṛham yāva ca gagāyāḥ tīrtham mārgam pratijāgṛtha  /

original: aṣṭapadasamamaviṣamaṁ pāṇitalajātaṁ vitatavitānaṁ citraduṣyaparikṣiptaṁ osaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṁ dhūpitadhūpanaṁ siktasaṁmṛṣṭaṁ muktapuṣpāvakīrṇaṁ
analyzed: aṣṭa pada samam aviṣamam pāṇi tala jātam vitata vitānam citra duṣya parikṣiptam osakta paṭṭa dāma kalāpam dhūpita dhūpanam sikta samṛṣṭam mukta puṣpa avakīrṇa

original: nāvāsaṁkramaṁ bandhāpetha yena bhagavāṁ saśrāvakasaṁgho gaṁgāyāṁ tariṣyati vaiśāliṁ gamanāya |
analyzed: na āvāsa kramam yena bhagavān sa śrāvaka saghaḥ gagāyām tariṣyati vaiśālim gamanāya

original: ardhayojanike ca antare maṇḍapasaṁvidhānaṁ kā[rāpetha annapāna]saṁvidhānaṁ kārāpetha śayyāsanasaṁvidhānaṁ ca bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṁghasya  #
analyzed: ardha yojanike ca antare maṇḍapa savidhānam kārāpetha anna pāna savidhānam kārāpetha śayyā āsana savidhānam ca bhagavataḥ sa śrāvaka saghasya

original: sarvaṁ sukhopadhānaṁ yathā bhagavāṁ saśrāvakasaṁgho rājagṛhāto sukhaṁ vaiśāliṁ gaccheya bhikṣusaṁghaśca ||
analyzed: sarvam sukha upadhānam yathā bhagavān sa śrāvaka saghaḥ rājagṛhātaḥ sukham vaiśālim gaccheya bhikṣu saghaḥ ca

original: manasā devānāṁ vacasā pārthivānāṁ |
analyzed: manasā devānām vacasā pārthivānām

original: nacireṇāḍhyānāṁ karmaṇā daridrāṇāmiti ||
analyzed: nacireṇa āḍhyānām karmaṇā daridrāṇām iti

original: rājñā ca āṇattaṁ amātyehi ca sarvaṁ pratijāgṛtaṁ yathā āṇattaṁ ||
analyzed: rājñā ca āṇattam amātyehi ca sarvam pratijāgṛtam yathā āṇattam

original: bhagavāṁ saṁprasthito sārdhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghena ||
analyzed: bhagavān sa prasthitaḥ sārdham bhikṣu saghena

original: rājā śreṇiyo bimbisāro sayugyabalavāhano sadevīkumārāmātyaparijano rājārhehi paṁcahi cchatraśatehi dhāryamāṇehi osaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpehi sadhvajapatākehi  #
analyzed: rājā śreṇiyaḥ bimbisāraḥ sa yugya bala vāhanaḥ sa devī kumāra amātya parijanaḥ rāja arhehi pacahi chatra śatehi dhāryamāṇehi osakta paṭṭa dāma kalāpehi sa dhvaja patākehi

original: mahatā rājānubhāvena mahatā rājaṛddhīye mahatāye vibhūṣāye bhagavantaṁ vaiśāliṁ gacchantaṁ samanuyāti ardhayojanikenāntarāvāsena yāvatsvakaṁ  #
analyzed: mahatā rāja anubhāvena mahatā rājaṛddhīye bhagavantam vaiśālim gacchantam samanuyāti ardha yojanikena antarāvāsena yāvat svakam

original: viṣayaṁ gaṁgāyāḥ tīraḥ ||
analyzed: viṣayam gagāyāḥ tīraḥ

original: aśroṣuḥ vaiśālakā lecchavikā edṛśāye vi- p.259 dhīye rājā śreṇiyo bimbisāro bhagavato anuyānaṁ karoti rājagṛhāto vaiśālimāgacchantasyeti ||
analyzed: aśroṣuḥ vaiśālakāḥ lecchavikāḥ vi  /

original: śrutvā ca punaḥ yāva ca vaiśālī yāva ca gaṁgātīrthaṁ vaiśālakānāṁ lecchavīnāṁ vijitamatrāntare mārgaṁ pratijāgraṁsu aṣṭapadasamamaviṣamaṁ pāṇitalajātaṁ  #
analyzed: śrutvā ca punar yāva ca vaiśālī yāva ca gagā tīrtham vaiśālakānām leccha vīnām vijita matra antare mārgam pratijāgrasu aṣṭa pada samam aviṣamam pāṇi tala jātam

original: siktasaṁmṛṣṭaṁ muktapuṣpāvakīrṇaṁ vitatavitānaṁ citraduṣyaparikṣiptaṁ osaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṁ dhūpitadhūpanaṁ ||
analyzed: sikta samṛṣṭam mukta puṣpa avakīrṇam vitata vitānam citra duṣya parikṣiptam osakta paṭṭa dāma kalāpam dhūpita dhūpanam

original: deśadeśehi na naṭanartanaṛllamallapāṇisvaryā sthāpayensu |
analyzed: deśa deśehi na sthāpayet su

original: ardhayojanikena ca antareṇa maṇḍapasaṁvidhānaṁ ca kārayensu śayyāsanasaṁvidhānaṁ ca pānīyasaṁvidhānaṁ ca bhaktasaṁvidhānaṁ ca bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṁghasya
analyzed: ardha yojanikena ca antareṇa maṇḍapa savidhānam ca kārayen su śayyā āsana savidhānam ca pānīya savidhānam ca bhakta savidhānam ca bhagavataḥ sa śrāvaka saghasya

original: abhyantaravaiśālīto caturaśīti rathasahasrāṇi yajāpayitvā dvecaturaśīti rathasahasrāṇi yojāpayitvā savaijayantikāni sanandighoṣāṇi sapuṣpamālāni  #
analyzed: caturaśīti ratha sahasrāṇi yajāpayitvā dve caturaśīti ratha sahasrāṇi yojāpayitvā sa vaijayantikāni sa nandi ghoṣāṇi sa puṣpa mālāni

original: sacchatradhvajapatākāni prathūtaṁ ca gandhamālyamādāya svakasvakāni bhadrāṇi yānānyabhiruhitvā mahatā rājānubhāvena mahatā rājaṛddhīye mahato  #
analyzed: sa chatra dhvaja patākāni prathūtam ca gandha mālyam ādāya svaka svakāni bhadrāṇi yānāni abhiruhitvā mahatā rāja anubhāvena mahatā rājaṛddhīye mahataḥ

original: janakāyasya hakkārahikkārabherīmṛdaṁgamarupaṇavaṁśakhasanninādena vaiśālīto nagarāto niryātā bhagavantaṁ pratyudgacchensu yāvadgaṁgātīrthaṁ  #
analyzed: jana kāyasya hakkāra hikkāra bherī mṛda ga maru paṇava śakha sanninādena vaiśālītaḥ nagarātaḥ niryātā bhagavantam pratyudgacchet su yāvat gagā tīrtham

original: bhagavataḥ pajārthaṁ ||
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pajā artham

original: teṣāṁ pi taṁ evaṁ saṁvidhānarūpaṁ abhūṣi ||
analyzed: teṣām pi tam evam sa vidhāna rūpam

original: santyatra lecchavayaḥ nīlāśvā nīlarathā nīlaraśmipratodā nīlayaṣṭī nīlavastrā nīlālaṁkārā nīlauṣṇīṣā nīlacchatrā nīlakhaḍgamaṇipādukavālavyaṁjanāḥ
analyzed: santi atra leccha vayaḥ nīla aśvāḥ nīla rathāḥ nīla raśmi pratodāḥ nīla yaṣṭī nīla vastrāḥ nīla alakārāḥ nīla oṣṇīṣāḥ nīla chatrāḥ nīla khaḍga maṇi pāduka vāla vyajanāḥ

original: tatredamiti ucyate ||
analyzed: tatra idam iti ucyate

original: nīlāśvā nīla rathā nīlā raśmipratodamuṣṇīṣā |
analyzed: nīla aśvā nīla rathā nīlā raśmi pratodam uṣṇīṣā

original: nīlā ca paṁca kakudā nīlā vastrā alaṁkārā ||
analyzed: nīlā ca paca kakudā nīlā vastrā alakārā

original: santyatra lecchavayaḥ pītāśvāḥ pītarathā pītaraśmipratodayaṣṭī pītavastrāḥ pītālaṁkārā pītoṣṇīṣā pītacchatrā pītakaḍgamaṇipādukā ||
analyzed: santi atra leccha vayaḥ pīta aśvāḥ pīta rathā pīta raśmi pratoda yaṣṭī pīta vastrāḥ pīta alakārā pīta uṣṇīṣā pīta chatrā pīta kaḍga maṇi pādukā

original: tatredamucyate ||
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: p.260 pītāśvā pīta rathā pītā raśmipratodamuṣṇīṣā |
analyzed: pīta aśvā pīta rathā pītā raśmi pratoda muṣṇīṣā

original: pītā ca paṁca kakudā pītā vastrā alaṁkārā ||
analyzed: pītā ca paca kakudā pītā vastrā alakārā

original: santyatra lecchavayo maṁjiṣṭāśvā maṁjiṣṭharathā maṁjiṣṭhāpratodayaṣṭī maṁjiṣṭhavastrā maṁjiṣṭhaalaṁkārā maṁjiṣṭhauṣṇīṣā maṁjiṣṭhacchatrāḥ maṁjiṣṭhamaṇipādukavālavyaṁjanāḥ
analyzed: santi atra leccha vayaḥ majiṣṭa aśvāḥ majiṣṭha rathāḥ majiṣṭha apratoda yaṣṭī majiṣṭha vastrāḥ majiṣṭha alakārāḥ majiṣṭha oṣṇīṣāḥ majiṣṭha chatrāḥ majiṣṭha maṇi pāduka vāla vyajanāḥ

original: tatredamucyate ||
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: maṁjiṣṭhā aśvarathā mañjiṣṭha raśmipratodayaṣṭī ca |
analyzed: majiṣṭhāḥ aśva rathāḥ mañjiṣṭha raśmi pratoda yaṣṭī ca

original: maṁjiṣṭha paṁca kakudā maṁjiṣṭha vastraalaṁkārāḥ ||
analyzed: majiṣṭha paca kakudā majiṣṭha vastra alakārāḥ

original: santyatra lecchavayo lohitāśvā lohitarathā lohitapratodayaṣṭī lohitavastrā lohitālaṁkārā lohitauṣṇīṣā lohitacchatrāḥ lohitakhaḍgamaṇipādukavālavyaṁjanāḥ
analyzed: santi atra leccha vayaḥ lohita aśvāḥ lohita rathāḥ lohita pratoda yaṣṭī lohita vastrāḥ lohita alakārāḥ lohita oṣṇīṣāḥ lohita chatrāḥ lohita khaḍga maṇi pāduka vāla vyajanāḥ

original: tatredamucyate ||
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: lohitā aśvā rathā ca lohita raśmipratodayaṣṭī ca |
analyzed: lohitā aśvā rathā ca lohita raśmi pratoda yaṣṭī ca

original: lohita ca paṁca kakudā lohita vastrā alaṁkārāḥ ||
analyzed: lohita ca paca kakudā lohita vastrā alakārāḥ

original: santyatra lecchavayo śvetāśvā śvetarathā śvetapratodayaṣṭī ca śvetavastrāḥ śvetālaṁkārāḥ śvetoṣṇīṣāḥ śvetacchatrāḥ śvetakhaḍgāḥ śvetamaṇipādukavālavyaṁjanāḥ
analyzed: santi atra ca śveta vastrāḥ śveta alakārāḥ śveta uṣṇīṣāḥ śveta chatrāḥ śveta khaḍgāḥ śveta maṇi pāduka vāla vyajanāḥ

original: tatredamucyate ||
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: śvetāśvā śveta rathā śveta raśmipratodayaṣṭī ca |
analyzed: śveta aśvā śveta rathā śveta raśmi pratoda yaṣṭī ca

original: śvetā ca paṁca kakudā śvetā vastrā alaṁkārāḥ ||
analyzed: śvetā ca paca kakudā śvetā vastrā alakārāḥ

original: santyatra lecchavayo haritāśvā haritarathāḥ haritaraśmipratodayaṣṭī ca haritavastrā p.261 haritālaṁkārā haritoṣṇīṣā haritacchatrā haritakhaḍgā  #
analyzed: santi atra leccha vayaḥ harita aśvāḥ harita rathāḥ harita raśmi pratoda yaṣṭī ca harita vastrā harita alakārā harita uṣṇīṣā harita chatrā harita khaḍgā  /

original: haritamaṇipādukavālavyaṁjanāḥ ||
analyzed: harita maṇi pāduka vāla vyajanāḥ

original: tatredamucyate ||
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: haritāśvā harita rathā haritā raśmipratodayaṣṭī ca |
analyzed: harita aśvā harita rathā haritā raśmi pratoda yaṣṭī ca

original: haritā ca paṁca kakudā haritā vastrā alaṁkārāḥ ||
analyzed: haritā ca paca kakudā haritā vastrāḥ alakārāḥ

original: santyatra lecchavayo vyāyuktāśvā vyāyuktarathā vyāyuktaraśmipratodayaṣṭī vyāyuktavastrā vyāyuktālaṁkārā vyāyuktauṣṇīṣā vyāyuktacchatrā vyāyuktakhaḍgā  #
analyzed: santi atra leccha vayaḥ vyāyukta aśvāḥ vyāyukta rathāḥ vyāyukta raśmi pratoda yaṣṭī vyāyukta vastrāḥ vyāyukta alakārāḥ vyāyukta oṣṇīṣāḥ vyāyukta chatrāḥ vyāyukta khaḍgāḥ

original: vyāyuktamaṇipādukavālavyaṁjanāḥ ||
analyzed: vyāyukta maṇi pāduka vāla vyajanāḥ

original: tatredamucyate ||
analyzed: tatra idam ucyate

original: vyāyuktā aśvarathā vyāyukta raśmipratodayaṣṭī ca |
analyzed: vyāyuktāḥ aśva rathāḥ vyāyukta raśmi pratoda yaṣṭī ca

original: vyāyukta paṁca kakudā vyāyukta vastraalaṁkārāḥ ||
analyzed: vyāyukta paca kakudā vyāyukta vastraalakārāḥ

original: santyatra lecchavayo suvarṇacchatrehi kuṁjarehi nānālaṁkārabhūṣitehi ||
analyzed: santi atra suvarṇa chatrehi kujarehi nānā alakāra bhūṣitehi

original: santyatra lecchavayo suvarṇaśivikāhi sarvaratanabhūṣitāhi ||
analyzed: santi atra suvarṇa śivikā hi sarva ratana bhūṣitā hi

original: santyatra lecchavayo suvarṇamayehi rathehi savaijayantehi sanandighoṣehi sakhurapravāśīhi ucchritacchatradhvajapatākehi ||
analyzed: santi atra suvarṇa mayehi rathehi sa vaijayantehi sa nandighoṣehi sa khura pravāśīhi ucchrita chatra dhvaja patākehi

original: evaṁrūpeṇa anubhāvena evaṁrūpāye vidhiye evaṁrūpeṇa samudayena evaṁrūpāye rājaṛddhīye evaṁrūpāye samṛddhīye evaṁrūpāye saṁvṛttāye edṛśāye vibhūṣāye  #
analyzed: evarūpeṇa anubhāvena evarūpāye vidhiye evarūpeṇa samudayena evarūpāye rājaṛddhīye evarūpāye samṛddhīye evarūpāye savṛttāye edṛśāye vibhūṣāye  /

original: vaiśālakā lecchavayo dvecaturaśītihi yānasahasrehi gośṛṁgī ca āmrapālikā ca tadyathā so pi mahājanakāyo bhagavantaṁ pratyudgatā yāvadgaṁgāyā  #
analyzed: vaiśālakāḥ leccha vayaḥ dve caturaśītihi yāna sahasrehi gośṛgī ca āmrapālikā ca tat yathā saḥ pi mahā jana kāyaḥ bhagavantam pratyudgatā yāvadgagāyā

original: tīrthaṁ ||
analyzed: tīrtham

original: bhagavāṁ gaṁgāye pārime kūle rājño śreṇiyasya bimbisārasya māgadhakānāṁ brāhmaṇakānāṁ dharmayā kathayā saṁdarśayitvā samuttejayitvā saṁpraharṣayitvā  #
analyzed: bhagavān gagāye pārime kūle rājñaḥ śreṇiyasya bimbisārasya māgadhakānām brāhmaṇakānām dharmayā kathayā sa darśayitvā samuttejayitvā sa praharṣayitvā

original: māgadhakānāṁ brāmhaṇakānāṁ caturaśīti sahasrāṇi dharmābhisamaye pratiṣṭhāpetvā yena vaiśālakā leccha- p.262 vayo tena viloketvā bhikṣūṇāṁ āmantreti
analyzed: māgadhakānām brāmhaṇakānām caturaśīti sahasrāṇi dharma abhisamaye pratiṣṭhāpetvā yena vaiśālakāḥ leccha tena bhikṣūṇām āmantreti

original: bhikṣavo na dṛṣṭapūrvā devā trāyastriṁśāḥ sudarśanāto nagarāto udyānabhūmimabhiniṣkramantā |
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ na dṛṣṭa pūrvā devā trāyastriśāḥ sudarśanātaḥ nagarātaḥ udyāna bhūmim abhiniṣkramantā

original: te etarahi vaiśālakā lecchavayo paśyatha ||
analyzed: te etarahi vaiśālakāḥ leccha vayaḥ paśyatha

original: tatkasya hetoḥ ||
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tādṛśāye va bhikṣavo ṛddhīye devā trāyastriṁśā sudarśanāto nagarāto udyānabhūmimabhiniṣkramanti ||
analyzed: va bhikṣavaḥ ṛddhīye devā trāyastriśā sudarśanātaḥ nagarātaḥ udyāna bhūmim abhiniṣkramanti

original: sphītāni rājyāni praśāmyamānā samyak rājyāni karonti jñātayo |
analyzed: sphītāni rājyāni praśāmyamānā samyak rājyāni karonti jñātayaḥ

original: tathā ime lecchavimadhye santo devehi śāstā upamāmakāsi ||
analyzed: tathā ime leccha vimadhye santaḥ deva ihi śāstā upamāmakā asi

original: trāyastriṁśā yehi na dṛṣṭapūrvā udyānabhūmiṁ abhiniṣkramantā |
analyzed: trāyastriśā ye hi na dṛṣṭa pūrvā udyāna bhūmim abhiniṣkramantā

original: etādṛśī samiti abhūṣi teṣāṁ yathā iyaṁ samṛddhi lecchavīnāṁ ||
analyzed: etādṛśī samiti teṣām yathā iyam

original: suvarṇacchatrehi ca kuṁjarehi śivikāhi sauvarṇamayīhi cānye |
analyzed: suvarṇa chatrehi ca kujarehi śivikāhi sauvarṇa mayīhi ca anye

original: rathehi sauvarṇamayehi cānye pratyudgamaṁ lecchavino karonti ||
analyzed: rathehi sauvarṇa mayehi ca anye pratyudgamam karonti

original: sarve sametvā saha jñātibandhavo daharā ca madhyā ca mahallakā ca |
analyzed: sarve sametvā saha jñāti bandhavaḥ daharā ca madhyā ca mahallakā ca

original: alaṁkṛtā laktakaraktavastrā pratyudgatā te ca vicitracārī ||
analyzed: alakṛtā laktaka rakta vastrā pratyudgatā te ca vicitra cārī

original: tahiṁ dāni gaṁgāyāṁ rājño śreṇiyasya bimbisārasya nāvāsaṁkramaṁ abhyantaravaiśā- p.263 lakānāṁ nāvāsaṁkramaṁ bāhiravaiśālakānāṁ nāvāsaṁkramaṁ  #
analyzed: tahim dāni gagāyām rājñaḥ śreṇiyasya bimbisārasya nāvāsa kramam abhyantara vaiśālakānām nāvāsa kramam bāhira vaiśālakānām nāvāsa kramam

original: gāṁgeyehi nāgehi kambalāśvatarehi nāvāsaṁkramo kṛto ||
analyzed: gāgeyehi nāgehi kambala aśvatarehi nāvāsa kramaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: bhagavānasmadīyena uttariṣyatīti ||
analyzed: bhagavān asmadīyena uttariṣyati iti

original: śukena gośṛṁgīye vacanena bhagavāṁ saśrāvakasaṁgho śuvetanāya bhaktena upanimantrito tasya ca bhagavatā tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsitaṁ ||
analyzed: śukena gośṛgīye vacanena bhagavān sa śrāvaka saghaḥ śu vetanāya bhaktena upanimantritaḥ tasya ca bhagavatā tūṣṇībhāvena adhivāsitam

original: tena śukena bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanā buddhānubhāvena vijñātā |
analyzed: tena śukena bhagavataḥ tūṣṇībhāvena adhivāsanā buddha anubhāvena vijñātā

original: so bahgavataḥ pādā śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā pratyāgato ||
analyzed: saḥ bahgavataḥ pādā śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam bhikṣu sagham ca pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā pratyāgataḥ

analyzed: kenimā tāta ghaṭikārasya kumbhakārasya nava chadanā āveśana śālā uttṛṇīkṛtā tṛṇāni hṛtāni
